La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gladys; ella tiene 39 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de cuyes y pollos, la socia los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en el mercado de Urubamba desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de animales menores. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar animales como pollos y cuyes y también alimentos para los animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gladys is a member of the Communal Bank “Santa Rosita de Ayllupampa” which is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

She is 39 years old, in a common law marriage, and has four children. Gladys divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling guinea pigs and chickens. She raises and fattens the animals before selling them at the market in Urubamba, where she works from 9am to 5pm. Gladys wants to expand her business of selling small animals. The loan she is requesting will be used to acquire animals such as chickens and guinea pigs, as well as feed for the animals.

Gladys is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: To purchase chickens, guinea pigs, and animal feed.

loans.name: Alberto Jose

texts.es: EL SEÑOR T. LABORA COMO AGENTE DE SEGURIDAD, ES ACOMPAÑADO, TIENE UNA PERSONA A SU CARGO, ES LE PRIMER CREDITO QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE EL APOYO QUE LE BRINDA ESTA INSTITUCION, CON ESTE DESEMBOLSO VA A PODER CANCELAR DEUDA   QUE UTILIZO PARA GASTOS FUNEBRE DE SU MAMA.
texts.en:
Sr. Alberto T. works as a security guard. He is married and has one dependent. This is the first loan he has received from CEPRODEL. He is grateful for the support that the Institution has provided.

This loan will be used to repay the debt he accumulated as a result of his mother’s funeral expenses.

loans.use: To pay for his mother's funeral expenses.

loans.name: Miguel Arcangel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba., perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco. 

El socio es el Sr. Miguel Arcangel; el tiene 46 años de edad y es soltero y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de madera, el vende en forma independiente en la provincia de Urubamba y por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de madera.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar madera al por mayor.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Miguel Arcangel is a member of the Communal Bank “Santa Rosita de Ayllupampa” which is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

He is 46 years old, single, and has three children. Miguel divides his time between his daily activities and his business selling wood as an independent vendor in Urubamba Province. This business enables his children to get ahead. He wants to expand his business of selling wood. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy wood in bulk.

Miguel is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: To purchase wood in bulk.

loans.name: Giovanny Antonio

texts.es: EL SEÑOR E. LABORA COMO AYUDANTE  FONTANERO, ES ACOMPAÑADO, TIENE  CUATRO  PERSONA A SU CARGO, ESTE ES EL PRIMER CREDITO QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE LA OPROTUNIDAD QUE LE BRINDA, ESTE DESEMBOLSO LO NECESITA PARA COMPRAR MATERIALES DE CONSTRUCCION COMO CINZ, PERLINES, MANO DE OBRA, PARA LA REPARACION DEL TECHO DE SU VIVIENDA.
texts.en: Sr. Giovanny E. works as an assistant plumber.  He is in a relationship and has four dependents.  This is the first loan he has received from CEPRODEL.  He is grateful for the opportunity being given to him.  Giovanny needs the money to buy construction materials such as zinc, crossbeams, and to pay for labor so that the roof of his home can be repaired.

loans.use: To pay for materials and labor necessary to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase construction materials for making home improvements.

loans.name: Yuri Antonio

texts.es: Yuri Antonio se dedica a brindar el servicio de tricitaxi. Tiene más de 6 años que tiene este negocio. El se encuentra muy agradecido con este medio de vida que le ha proporcionado los ingreso necesarios, tiene 1 hijo menor de edad a su cargo, ya que anteriormente alquilaba un triciclo pero con mucho esfuerzo logro obtener el suyo propio, pues necesitaba obtener más ingresos para mantener a su familia. El es un hombre muy responsable que ha adquirido cierta experiencia con su negocio y sus clientes. Este crédito es para la compra de llantas, asientos, pedales, cadenas, entre otros arreglos que quiere realizarle a su tricitaxi.
texts.en:
Yuri Antonio provides transportation services with his tricycle taxi and has been in this business for more than six years. He is extremely grateful to be earning a livelihood that can provide the necessary income. Yuri has one dependent child. He previously rented a tricycle, but with great effort he was able to obtain one of his own so that he could earn more income to support his family.

Yuri is a responsible man who has gained experience by working with his business and his customers. This loan will be used to buy tires, seats, pedals, chains, and other parts so that he can make repairs to his tricycle taxi.

loans.use: To purchase tires, seats, pedals, chains, and other parts for his tricycle taxi.

loans.name: Manuel Jesus

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Manuel Jesus; el tiene 54 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de animales menores como cuyes, chanchos y pollos, el socio lo vende en el mercado de Urubamba desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 3:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de animales menores.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar animales menores como gallinas, chanchos y cuyes.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Manuel Jesus is a member of the Communal Bank “Santa Rosita de Ayllupampa” which is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

He is 54 years old, married, and has two children. Manuel divides his time between his daily activities and his business of selling small animals such as guinea pigs, pigs, and chickens. He sells the animals at the market in Urubamba from 9am to 3pm. This business enables his children to get ahead. Manuel wants to expand and improve his business of selling small animals. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy chickens, pigs, and guinea pigs.

Manuel is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: To purchase chickens, pigs, and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Miguel Atanacio

texts.es: Este cliente es originario de telica, pero tiene 16 año de vivir en la comarca  paso de laja la que queda ubicada del puente de telica1 kilometro al suroeste , es una persona emprendedora ya que el inicio a tener crédito para formar un audio comprando algunos instrumentos  en la empresa hoy ya tiene conformado todo un audio vendiendo servicio a todas las persona que se lo demanden además es albañil, y hoy es carpintero contruyendo camas muebles etc. y en la empresa ha tenido14 créditos los que él se siente satisfecho porque esto le ha ayudado a mejorar su nivel de vida y su esposa es costurera y ella lo apoya de forma incondicional ya que ella le ayuda en los eventos sociales cuando vende el servicio de audio en las iglesia católica o en vigilias cantando los cantos católicos, en cuanto a su familia tiene un hijo de crianza.
texts.en: Miguel is originally from Telica, but for the past sixteen years he has been living in a region across from the Telica Slab Bridge that is located one kilometer to the southwest.  He is an enterprising individual who began obtaining credit in order to buy audio equipment for his business.  Now he provides audio recording services to everyone who requests them.  In addition, Miguel has worked as a mason but now he is a carpenter who builds beds, furniture, and other items.  He has received fourteen loans and is pleased because they have helped improve the standard of living for himself and his wife, who works as a seamstress.  She provides unconditional support and helps him at social events at the Catholic Church, such as vigils and concerts, where he provides audio recording services.  Miguel and his wife have one child.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials such as zinc, plywood, rafters, nails,  and barbed wire.

loans.name: Nelly Maritza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nelly Maritza; ella tiene 25 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de golosinas y también a la crianza de animales como cuyes, la socia tiene una carreta donde vende diferentes golosinas como chupetes, galletas, gaseosas y chicles y la crianza de animales lo realiza en la provincia de Urubamba, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar los dos pequeños negocios que realiza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar golosinas al por mayor y también comprar alimentos para los cuyes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nelly Maritza belongs to the 'Santa Rosita de Ayllupampa' community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Nelly is 25 years old.  She lives with her partner and has 1 child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her businesses selling candy and raising animals such as guinea pigs.  Nelly has a small cart where she sells different candy such as lollipops, cookies, soda and chewing gum.  She raises her animals in Urubamba province.  She would like to expand and improve her two small businesses.

Nelly is requesting a loan to buy candy wholesale.  She would also like to buy feed for her guinea pigs.  She is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy candy wholesale and to buy feed for her guinea pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction supplies to improve his home

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. María; ella tiene 56 años de edad y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ganados y tambien vende chicha (bebida a base de maiz),la socia tambien vende jora que es un producto que se utiliza para hacer la chicha,ella vende en forma ambulatoria,la socia quiere mejorar sus negocios de venta de chicha y ganados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ingredientes para hacer chicha y alimentos para ganados.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the 'Santa Rosita de Ayllupampa' community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Maria is 56 years old, is married, and has six children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her businesses selling candy and raising animals such as guinea pigs. She also sells chica (a corn-based beverage) and jora, a product used to make chica. She sells her products by walking around. She would like to improve her business of selling chicha and guinea pigs. She is asking for the loan to purchase ingredients to make chica and to buy feed for her guinea pigs. 

She is happy with the loan and commits to making the repayments on her loan.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make chica and to buy feed for her guinea pigs

loans.name: Bismar Enrique

texts.es: Bismar Enrique tiene una pulpería. Su negocio consiste en ofrecer productos para el hogar, la mayoría de sus clientes solicitan una gran variedad de productos, por lo que él siempre está al pendiente de lo que ellos le están solicitando. El tomo la iniciativa de invertir en ciertos productos como granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos fue así que empezó y al observar que este medio de vida era rentable decide empezar con su nuevo negocio en su vivienda.   Este crédito es para la compra de ciertos productos que le solicitan como granos básicos, golosinas, enlatados, sopas, pan, galletas y detergentes. Sueña con tener un gran inventario en su negocio.
texts.en:
Bismar Enrique has a small grocery store where he sells household products.  His customers ask him for a wide range of products which means that he is always paying attention to what they are requesting.  Bismar took the initiative of investing in certain products such as basic grains, candy, soft drinks and that is how he started out.  He realized that this way of making a living was profitable and so decided to start his new business in his home.

Bismar will use this loan to buy certain products that his customers are requesting such as basic grains, candy, canned goods, soups, bread, cookies and detergents.  He dreams of his business having a large inventory.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candy, canned goods, soups, bread, cookies and detergents

loans.name: Juan Enrique

texts.es:
Juan Enrique Z. es una persona humilde y trabajadora que con esfuerzo propio ha logrado salir adelante junto a su familia donde él es el sostén del hogar y que gracias a su actividad de productor ganadero ha sabido darle una educación a sus hijos ya que el solo logro llegar hasta segundo grado de primaria.
Este  es el segundo crédito que solicita en ceprodel es para la compra de cerdo de engorde  ya que busca otra alternativa de ingreso de ingreso además de la producción lechera y venta de terneros 
Los créditos que ceprodel le han ayudado para mejorar su condición de vida ya que con el crédito anterior pudo aprovechar para aumentar su ganado y asi producir más leche con lo cual obtuvo mayor ingreso el cual lo invirtió en la compra de una picadora de pasto la cual es de mucho beneficio
texts.en:
Juan Enrique Z. is a very humble and hard-working person who, through his own efforts, has managed to get ahead in life together with his family.  He is responsible for supporting his household and, thanks to his business raising cattle, he has been able to provide his children with an education.  Juan himself only managed to reach second grade.

This is the second loan that Juan has requested from Ceprodel and he will use it to buy pigs to fatten since he is looking for another income in addition to the one he makes from selling milk and calves.

The loans that Juan has received from Ceprodel have helped him to improve his living conditions as he used his previous loan to increase the size of his herd.  This meant that his cattle produced more milk which made him more income.  He was consequently able to invest in buying an animal feed grinder which has benefited him a lot.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: EL SEÑOR MIGUEL LABORA COMO COLECTOR ,ES SOLTERO,TIENE UNA PERSONA A SU CARGO,ES LE PRIMER CREDITO QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, DA GRACIA A ESTA INSTITUCION POR BRINDALE  ESTE DESEMBOLSO QUE SERA UTILIZADO PARA COMPRA DE MATERIALES  DE CONSTRUCCION  COMO ARENA, CEMENTO, BLOQUE, HIERRO,ESTRIBO, CLAVO,MANO DE OBRA PARA REPARAR PARED DE SU VIVIENDA.
texts.en: Miguel works as a collector.  He is single and has one person in his care.  This is the first loan that Ceprodel have granted him.  Miguel would like to thank the institution for having provided him with this loan which he will use to buy construction supplies such as sand, cement, blocks, iron, brace and nails, and to pay labor costs, so that he can have one of the walls in his home repaired.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to make improvements to his home

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosa; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras y productos secos, ella vende en forma ambulatoria llevando a lugares como yanatile, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras y productos secos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras y granos secos al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA” community bank. The bank is located in the district of Urubamba, which belongs to the province of Urubamba and departament of Cuzco.

The member's name is Rosa. She is 37 years old, single, and has 4 children. she alternates her daily activities with selling vegetables and dry products. She sells as a sreeet vendor, going to different places, such as Yanatile. With this business, she gets her children ahead. Rosa wants to expand her business selling vegetables and dry products. She is asking for the loan to buy vegetables and dry products wholesale.  

She is happy with the loan and committed to making the payments on time.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and dry grains wholesale

loans.name: Ricardo Jose

texts.es: EL SEÑOR RICARDO LABORA COMO ALBAÑIL ,ES ACOMPAÑADO ,TIENE  TRES  PERSONA A SU CARGO,ES LE PRIMER CREDITO QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, DA GRACIA A ESTA INSTITUCION POR BRINDALE  ESTE DESEMBOLSO QUE SERA UTILIZADO PARA COMPRA DE MATERIALES  DE CONSTRUCCION  COMO ARENA, CEMENTO, BLOQUE, HIERRO,ESTRIBO, CLAVO,MANO DE OBRA PARA HACER BAÑO Y COCINA DE SU VIVIENDA.
texts.en: Mr. Ricardo works as a bricklayer. He is in a relationship and supports three people. This is the first loan that  CEPRODEL has given him. He is grateful to the institution for offering this disbursment. It will be used to buy construction materials such as sand, cement, blocks, iron bars, supports, nails, and labor costs to make a bathroom and kitchen in his house.

loans.use: to do home improvement, to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover the expenses of her University course

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy footwear, sheets, towels, clothes, cosmetics and treatments

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction supplies to improve her home

loans.name: Svetla Paola

texts.es: La señora Svetla P. trabaja para una institución en la ciudad de Managua , en la actualidad está cursando el quinto año de la carrera de derecho la cual estudia por la noches y se ha caracterizado por ser muy inteligente y estudios. Solicita el crédito para invertirlo en el pago de su diploma universitario porque pronto será la promoción y así anhela cumplir sus sueños de llegar a ser una profesional de exito. Es importante destacar que es casada y con un hijo, agradece de antemano por el apoyo que se le brindará.
texts.en:
Mrs. Svetla P. works for an institution in the city of Managua. She's currently on her fifth year studying law, which she does in the evenings. She is known for being very smart and studious. She is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of her university diploma because that will enable her to receive a promotion and thus achieve her dreams of being a successful professional.

It is important to mention that she is married with one child, and is thankful for the support that you are bringing her.

loans.use: to pay for her law school diploma.

loans.name: María Lourdes

texts.es:
María Lourdes Z., es casada con un hijo en edad escolar al que tiene el deber de mantener en sus estudios. Se dedica a atender su propio desde hace 3 años en la ciudad de Managua.
Desde que inicio el negocio doña María se ha caracterizado por ser una persona esforzada y eficiente, ella inicio su negocio en su casa de habitación y desde entonces a mantenido su negocio y su núcleo familiar gracias a los múltiples esfuerzo.
 Una de las necesidades que atraviesa ella es la urgencia de comprar los productos de su negocio como lo son; Frijoles, especies y frutas para el fresco y carbón para cocer los frijoles, entre otros. Es  por este motivo que acude a cerpodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito que le permita los productos a sus proveedores y así continuar comercializándolos para satisfacer las demanda de sus clientes con el único fin de obtener los ingresos para mantener su hogar  continuar brindándole la educación a su único hijo.  
Es primera vez que solicita crédito con ceprodel.
texts.en:
Maria Lourdes Z. is married with a school-age child, whom she is expected to support during his time at school.  She has her own shop in Managua. Since she started the business Maria has proven to be a hard working and efficient person. She started the shop in her own home and since then she has managed to keep it up, as well as her family life, with a lot of effort. 

One of the needs she faces at the moment is the urgent purchase of products for her business, such as beans, spices and fruits for her fresh goods section and coal to cook beans with, among others. She's come to CEPRODEL hoping to benefit from a loan that will allow her to buy these products from her suppliers and continue to sell them, satisfying her customers' demand. This will bring income to support her family and continue to provide her only son with an education. This is her first credit request with  CEPRODEL.

loans.use: to buy beans, spices and fruits for the fresh product section and coal to cook beans.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Cirila; ella tiene 39 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de pollos y también se dedica a trabajar en un hospedaje y los pollos lo vende en forma independiente en la provincia de Urubamba por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere tener un lugar más amplio donde pueda vender los pollos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pollos y alimentos para los animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Cirila is a member of the "SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA" communal bank, located in the district of Urubamba, province of Urubamba, department of Cusco.

She is 39 years old, married with 2 children. As well as her daily activities she has a chicken raising business. She also works in a hostel. She sells the chickens independently in the province of Urubamba. Thanks to this business she is able to support her children. She'd like to have a larger place where to sell the chickens. She is requesting a loan to buy chickens and chicken feed. She is happy with the loan and is committed to repaying it as agreed.

loans.use: to buy chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Arnoldo Antonio

texts.es: EL SEÑOR A. LABORA COMO TECNICO EN REFRIGERACION Y AIRE ACONDICIONADO ,ES CASADO ,TIENE  TRES  HIJOS A SU CARGO, ES  EL PRIMER  CREDITO  QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE LA OPORTUNIDAD QUE LE HAN BRINDADO  ESTA INSTITUCION  CON LOS DESEMBOLSO QUE LE HAN APROBADO , ESTE CREDITO LO NECESITA PARA  COMPRAR CEMENTO, BLOQUE, HIERRO, MANO DE OBRA PARA HACER ANEXO CUARTO EN SU VIVIENDA.
texts.en: A. works as a refrigeration and air conditioning technician. He is married with three children to support. This is his first loan with CEPRODEL and would like to thank the organisation for its approval. He needs the loan to buy cement, blocks, iron and labour to build an annex room in his home.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her daughter's schooling.

loans.name: María José

texts.es:
María José C., es soltera con un hijo en edad escolar al que tiene el deber de mantener en sus estudios. Se dedica a atender su propio desde hace 5 años en la ciudad de Managua.
Desde que inicio el negocio doña María se ha caracterizado por ser una persona esforzada y eficiente, ella inicio su negocio vendiendo ambulante  y desde entonces a mantenido su negocio y su núcleo familiar gracias a sus múltiples esfuerzo. Una de las necesidades que atraviesa ella es la urgencia de comprar los productos de su negocio como lo son; ropa y productos de la avon, vogue, entre otros. Es  por este motivo que acude a cerpodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito que le permita comprar los productos a sus proveedores y así continuar comercializándolos para satisfacer las demanda de sus clientes con el único fin de obtener los ingresos para mantener su hogar  continuar brindándole la educación a su única hija.  Es primera vez que solicita crédito con ceprodel.
texts.en:
Maria Jose C. is single with a school-age child that she is expected to support whilst at school. For the last 5 years she has run her own business in the city of Managua. Since starting her business Maria has proven to be a hard working and efficient person. She started off with a street vending business and has since managed to keep it up, as well as her family life, with a lot of hard work. 

At the moment she urgently needs to buy products for her business, such as clothing and Avon and Vogue goods, amongst others. She's come to CEPRODEL to ask for a loan that will enable her to buy these products from her suppliers, so as to be able to continue to sell them to satisfy her customers' demand. This will generate income to support her family and continue to provide her daughter with an education. This is her first loan request with CEPRODEL.

loans.use: to buy clothing and Avon and Vogue products.

loans.name: Gerardo Wilfredo

texts.es: EL SEÑOR C. LABORA COMO TECNICO EN REFRIGERACION Y AIRE ACONDICIONADO ,ES SOLTERO ,TIENE  SEIS PERSONAS A SU CARGO, ES  EL PRIMER  CREDITO  QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE LA OPORTUNIDAD QUE LE HAN BRINDADO  ESTA INSTITUCION  CON LOS DESEMBOLSO QUE LE HAN APROBADO , ESTE CREDITO LO NECESITA PARA  COMPRAR CEMENTO, BLOQUE, HIERRO, MANO DE OBRA,CINZ , PERLIN PARA HACER ANEXO CUARTO  Y COCINA EN SU VIVIENDA.
texts.en:
Mr. C. works as a refrigeration and air conditioning technician. He is single and in charge of six people.

This is his first loan from Ceprodel and he is grateful for the opportunity given by the institution. The loan is needed to buy cement, iron, zinc and to pay for labor to build a room and kitchen in his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es: LA SEÑORA  G.  LABORA COMO ANALISTA DE RECLAMO ,ES CASADA ,TIENE  TRES  PERSONAS A SU CARGO, ES  EL PRIMER  CREDITO  QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE LA OPORTUNIDAD QUE LE HAN BRINDADO  ESTA INSTITUCION  CON LOS DESEMBOLSO QUE LE HAN APROBADO , ESTE CREDITO LO NECESITA PARA  COMPRAR CINZ PERLINES, MANO DE OBRA, PARA  ENTECHAR  YA QUE SE ENCUENTRA EN MAL ESTADO EN SU VIVIENDA
texts.en:
Mrs. G. works as a claim analyst, is married and has three dependents. 
This is her first loan from Ceprodel and she is grateful for the opportunity given by the institution. This loan is needed to buy zinc sheets and pay labor to put a roof on her house which is in bad condition.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es:
La sra. Rosa se dedica a la venta de nacatamales los fines de semana en su casa de habitación donde es bien conocida entre sus vecinos los cuales compran el producto
Utilizara este crédito para mejorar su casa donde quiere cambiar los pilares los cuales se están hundiendo y con la compra de los perlines mejorar la vivienda 
Este es el quinto crédito que trabaja con ceprodel donde se siente agradecida por el apoyo brindado ya que con los créditos ha logrado mejorar su negocio 
La señora vive con dos de sus hijos quienes trabajan y le ayudan para los gastos de la casa y alimentación
texts.en:
Mrs. Rosa sells ‘nacatamales’ [maize, meat and rice wrapped in banana leaves] on the weekend at her home. She is well known by her neighbors who buy her products.

She will use the loan to make her house better. She wishes to change the posts because they are sinking and to buy metal sheets to make the improvements. This is her fifth loan from Ceprodel. She is grateful for the support given because through the loans she has been able to improve her business. 

She lives with two of her children who work and help her with the house expenses and the cost of food.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets and bags of cement.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials like zinc sheets, nails and paint.

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es: EL SEÑOR P.  LABORA COMO SEGURIDA INTERNA ,ES SOLTERO ,TIENE  DOS PERSONAS A SU CARGO, ES  EL QUINTO  CREDITO  QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE LA OPORTUNIDAD QUE LE HAN BRINDADO  ESTA INSTITUCION  CON LOS DESEMBOLSO QUE LE HAN APROBADO , ESTE CREDITO LO NECESITA PARA  COMPRAR CEMENTO, BLOQUE, HIERRO, MANO DE OBRA,PARA HACER  BAÑO  Y COCINA EN SU VIVIENDA.
texts.en:
Mr. P. works in internal security. He is single with two dependents.
This is the fifth loan granted to him by CEPRODEL. He is grateful for the opportunity provided by this organization's approval of the loan disbursement.
He needs this loan to buy cement, blocks, iron and labour to build a bathroom and kitchen in his home.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials like blocks, cement, iron and sand.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia forma parte del banco comunal “Barrio Alto”, perteneciente a la ciudad de San Fernando. Ella se dedica a la confección de cortinas, desde hace 8 años y sus cortinas las vende en la feria. Ahí trabaja los días miércoles, sábados y domingos. El resto de los días de la semana se dedica a confeccionar y comprar telas. Su mercadería la compra en la ciudad de Santiago. 
Con éste préstamo comprará telas.
Patricia vive junto a su nieto de 9 años de edad, él asiste al colegio y le va muy bien. Ella está a cargo de su nieto desde los 3 años de edad.
Su sueño es tener un taller, por lo cual está ampliando su casa para concretar éste proyecto. Patricia ya cuenta con cinco maquinas de coser, 2 de estas son overlock (maquinas de coser industrial). Su propósito es vender y entregar cortinas al comercio establecido, para no seguir vendiendo en la feria. 
Sus motivaciones son brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su nieto, más confortable y poder costear sus estudios. 
Patricia está muy agradecida de Fondo esperanza, no solo por el crédito sino también por la ayuda que recibió cuando su negocio y casa fueron asolados por el terremoto del 27 de febrero del año 2010. Respecto a las reuniones, ella se siente muy cómoda y le sirve como distracción.
San Fernando es una ciudad ubicada en la región del Libertador General Bernardo O’higgins , zona centro de Chile. La actividad económica de la ciudad se basa principalmente en la agricultura (viñedos, cultivo de remolacha, frutales, tabaco, trigo y cultivo tradicional), la agroindustria (empresas exportadoras de frutas, conserveras, de lácteos, etc.) y el comercio.
texts.en:
Patricia is part of Barrio Alto Communal Bank in the city of San Fernando. She has worked making curtains for the past eight years and sells them at the market where she works Wednesdays, Saturdays and Sundays. During the remaining days of the week, she works making and buying fabrics. She purchases her merchandise in the city of Santiago. She will buy fabric with this loan.

Patricia lives with her 9-year-old grandson. He is in school and does very well. She has cared for him since he was 3 years old.

Her dream is to have a workshop, which is why she is expanding her house to make this project a reality. Patricia already has five sewing machines, two of which are overlock (industrial sewing machines). Her goal is to sell and deliver curtains to an established shop, but not continue selling at the market. Her motivations are to provide her grandson with a more comfortable and better quality of life and to finance his studies.

Patricia is very grateful to Fondo Esperanza, not only for the loan but also the help provided when her business and home were devastated by the February 27, 2010 earthquake. She feels very comfortable at the meetings and they are a diversion for her.

San Fernando is a city located in the Libertador General Bernando O’Higgins region in central Chile. The city’s primary businesses are agriculture (vineyards, beets, fruit, tobacco, wheat and traditional crops), agribusiness (businesses that export fruit, canned food, dairy, etc.), and trade.

loans.use: to buy fabrics.

loans.name: Marlíng De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
La señora S. se dedica a la venta de quesillos en la ciudad de Managua , utilizara este crédito para mejorar su vivienda ya que la quiere mejorar antes que el invierno llegue 
Tiene más de ocho año de dedicarse a esta actividad este producto lo vende en los colegios y mercados de la capital 
Marling está casada con dos hijos a cargo este es el quinto crédito que solicita en ceprodel, los cuales comenta que le han beneficiado mucho los prestamos tanto para su casa como para el negocio ya que ha logrado mejorar su vivienda y vender más productos
texts.en:
Ms. Solis works selling cheese in the city of Managua. She has been working selling cheese for more than eight years and she sells it at the schools and markets in the capital city. She will use this loan to make housing improvements, as she wants to make them before winter arrives.

Marling is married with two children and this is her fifth loan with CEPRODEL. She comments that she benefited greatly from the previous loans, both for her house and her business. As a result, she has been able to make housing improvements and sell more products.

loans.use: to buy zinc sheeting, cement, beams, and bricks.

loans.name: Justina Emperatriz

texts.es: Justina Emperatriz tiene su negocio que es una pulpería. Tiene más de 6 años en este negocio, por lo que ha demostrado ser una persona luchadora y que disfruta de su medio de vida. Esta no es la primera vez que solicita créditos para su negocio por lo que se siente muy contenta con este medio de vida. Su mayor desafío ha sido su salud, por lo que algunas veces ella se siente indispuesta y no puede abrir la pulpería, pues esto le ocasiona pérdidas con sus clientes y ciertos productos. Este crédito es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, galletas, granos básicos, sopas, enlatados, pan entre otros.
texts.en: Justina Emperatriz has had a small store for six years and through this, she has proven to be a hardworking woman who enjoys her work.  This is not her first time requesting a loan for her business, which is why she is happy with her business.  Her greatest challenge has been her health, as she sometimes does not feel well and cannot open the store, thus resulting in a loss of customers and certain products.  This loan is for the purchase of candy, soft drinks, crackers, basic grains, soups, canned goods, bread, etc.

loans.use: to buy candy, soft drinks, crackers, basic grains, soups, canned goods, bread, etc.

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es: EL SEÑOR A.  LABORA COMO ALBAÑIL ,ES CASADO ,TIENE  SEIS  HIJOS A SU CARGO, ES  EL PRIMER  CREDITO  QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE LA OPORTUNIDAD QUE LE HAN BRINDADO  ESTA INSTITUCION  CON LOS DESEMBOLSO QUE LE HAN APROBADO , ESTE CREDITO LO NECESITA PARA  COMPRAR CEMENTO, BLOQUE, HIERRO,ARENA,ESTRIBO , MANO DE OBRA,PARA REPARAR PARED  EN SU VIVIENDA.
texts.en: Mr. A. is married, has six children, and is a builder.  This is the first loan that CEPRODEL has granted to him.  He is grateful for the opportunity provided by the lending institution in approving the disbursement of the loan.  He needs this loan to purchase cement, blocks, iron, sand, buttresses and labor to repair a wall of his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials like stone, sand, cement, and steel.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Magali Francisca

texts.es: La señora M. S., tiene una pulpería en su casa de habitación, la cual atiende personalmente con la ayuda de su hijo mayor,  con los prestamos que se le han atendido ha venido ampliando su negocio y mejorando su vivienda con las ganancia que le genera la pulpería, con el apoyo de su esposo que trabaja como mecánico, mantienen los gastos de la casa y la educación de sus hijos. Ahora necesita de este nuevo financiamiento para mejorar el inventario de la mercadería  y dar mayor atención a sus clientes para obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en: Mrs. Martinez S. runs a small general store out of her home.  She personally runs the store with the help of her oldest son.  With the loans she has previously received, she has expanded her store and improved her home with the income she has generated through the store.  With the help of her husband who works as a mechanic, they cover the household expenses and the education of their children.  Now she needs a loan to improve the inventory of her store in order to better tend to her customers and increase her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase general store products: sugar, rice, beans, oil, corn, coffee, soap, paper, clothes, shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction supplies such as stone, sand, cement and iron

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, beams, sand and blocks, to pay for labor (to improve her home), and to cover some medical expenses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: TO BUY CONSTRUCTION MATERIALS (ZINC SHEETING, CROSSBEAMS, NAILS, AND PAINT) TO REPLACE THE ROOF AND PAINT THE HOUSE

loans.name: Fátima Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Fátima es una persona que se dedica al destace de cerdos la cual ella vende en su casa el producto como es la carne lonjas de la cual saca chicharrones así como también fritos y nacatamales atraves de su negocio ella ha podido sacar  adelante a su familia ya que es madre soltera con los créditos brindados por ceprodel ella ha logrado aumentar su negocio con estos en la actualidad ha logrado que una d sus hijas logre estudiar en la universidad.
Este crédito lo solicita para incrementar sus ventas ya que ella es bien reconocida en este municipio como vendedora de carne de cerdos ya que llegan hasta su casa a comprarle el producto
texts.en:
Fátima works as a butcher, selling pork and pork products that she makes, such as pork rinds and pork-filled tamales, in her home. Through her business, Fátima has been able to raise her family as a single mother. With the loans provided by Ceprodel, Fátima has grown her business and has been able to send one of her daughters to college. 

Fátima requests a loan in order to grow sales since she is well-known in her town as a pork butcher and customers come to her home to buy products from her.

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Alba Nubia

texts.es: LA SEÑORA G.  LABORA COMO RESPONSABLE DE UNIDAD ,ES  SOLTERA ,TIENE  DOS  HIJOS A SU CARGO, ES  EL TERCER  CREDITO  QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE EL APOYO  QUE  LE HA BRINDADO  ESTA INSTITUCION  CON LOS DESEMBOLSO QUE LE HAN APROBADO , ESTE CREDITO LO NECESITA  COMPRAR MATERIALES DE CONSTRUCCION COMO CEMENTO, BLOQUE, HIERRO,ARENA,ESTRIBO , MANO DE OBRA,PARA REPARAR  PARTE        DE SU VIVIENDA QUE SE ENCUENTRA EN MAL ESTADO..
texts.en: Alba, a responsible worker, is a single mother who cares for her two children. This is her third loan with Ceprodel. She is grateful for the support that Ceprodel has given her and for the expenditures that she has been permitted to make. With this loan, Alba will buy building materials such as cement block, iron, sand, stirrups and labor in order to make improvements to her home.

loans.use: To purchase building materials

loans.name: Yolanda Isabel

texts.es: Yolanda Isabel su negocio es un cafetín. Tiene 7 años en este negocio, pues no es la primera vez que solicita créditos, ya que se siente muy agradecida pues es así que su negocio ha progresado. Inicio por la necesidad de obtener un ingreso es así que obtiene este trabajo diariamente por lo que le gusta mucho el hablar con sus clientes pues siempre ha demostrado ser una persona responsable con pagos. El motivo de su crédito es para la compra de sopas, pan, galletas, refrescos, golosinas, café, sándwich, hamburguesa, hot dog entre otros productos.  Sueña con su hijo logre finalizar sus estudios, para sentirse orgullosa.
texts.en:
Yolanda has run a small café for 7 years. This is not the first time that she requests a loan. She is very grateful for prior loans, which have helped her business grow. Yolanda’s business began out of her need to earn an income. What she really enjoys about her daily job is talking with her customers. 

Yolanda has proven to be very responsible with payments. The purpose of this loan is to purchase soup, bread, cookies, drinks, candies, coffee, sandwiches, hamburgers, hot dogs and other products. She dreams that her son will finish his studies, making her very proud.

loans.use: To buy food for cafe

loans.name: Luis Adolfo

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Managua. El  Sr. Luis Adolfo López, se dedica  arduamente a laborar de kardista, dedicándose a esta labor desde hace veinte y tres   años, es casado y con dos hijos a los que tiene que proporcionarles las condiciones necesarias para que se desarrollen.
Una de las necesidades que el  Sr.  Luis atraviesa hoy en día es que debe mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda debido a que ha estado en malas condiciones por lo que a tomado la sabia decisión de iniciar la obra de mejora. Es por ese motivo que acude a ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro, Para realizar la mejora de  la vivienda realizando  el levantamiento de una pared en su casa de habitación. 
Por medio de esta obra brindara mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos. Es importante destacar que por medio de la realización de esta obra, le proporcionara a su familia un techo digno donde vivir y con todas las condiciones necesarias para el desarrollo de sus hijos.
texts.en:
In the city of Managua, Luis Adolfo López works hard as a stock manager.  He has been in this job for twenty-three years.  He is married and has two children who he must provide for.

One of the needs that Luis currently has is that of improving the condition of his home because it is in a bad state of repair.  He has taken the wise decision to start on some improvement work.  He has approached Ceprodel to request a loan in order to buy construction supplies such as stone, sand, cement and iron in order to carry out home improvements; building a wall in his home.

This work will provide Luis' children with better living conditions.  It is important to highlight that by carrying out this work, Luis will be providing his family with a decent home in which to live and providing his children with the necessary conditions in which to grow up and develop.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies such as stone, sand, cement and iron

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es: Gloria tiene 36 años, vive al lado de su esposo y sus hijos en su casa propia. Se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte desde hace más de 5 años, su esposo es el conductor del carro y ella es la que controla el kilometraje de recorrido así como los ingresos diarios. Considera que este trabajo es muy beneficioso para su tener una estabilidad económica ya que con ello puede cubrir los gastos de su hogar. Adicionalmente tiene a su disposición otro vehículo del que es conducido por un chofer contratado, para cubrir la misma ruta de transporte. Su gran ventaja es no tener competencia en este rubro, por ello hace lo posible por hacer un buen servicio y que hasta el momento lo ha hecho con éxito. Es su crédito número 3 con MFP y considera que ha sido una muy grata la experiencia haber trabajado de manera grupal en su banco comunal a pesar de los conflictos que atravesaron y permitieron fortalecer su grupo, en la actualidad se siente contenta de ser parte de este grupo humano. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en al compra de algunos repuestos para su carro y el pago del mantenimiento mecánico.
texts.en:
Gloria is 36 years old and lives with her husband and children in her home.  She has run a transportation service for 5 years.  Her husband is the driver and Gloria manages travel mileage as well the daily income.  She also has another vehicle which is driven by a contracted driver who services the same route.  She feels that this is a very beneficial job in terms of her economic stability as she is able to cover cost of living.  

A great advantage she has is that there are no competing transportation agencies.  Therefore, she does what she can to offer a good service and she has been able to do so thus far.  

This will be her third loan with MFP and she has been very pleased with her experience in working with the communal bank members, despite some challenges that, in the end, strengthened her group.   She is very happy to belong the group.  

She plans to use the loan to invest in a few auto parts for her car as well as in mechanical maintenance

loans.use: To purchase auto parts and carry out mechanical maintenance.

loans.name: Patricia Del Carmen

texts.es: LA SEÑORA E.  LABORA COMO GRABADOR DE DATOS ,ES  SOLTERA ,TIENE  TRES PERSONAS  A SU CARGO, ES  EL TERCER  CREDITO  QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE EL APOYO  QUE  LE HA BRINDADO  CEPRODEL  CON LOS DESEMBOLSO QUE LE HAN APROBADO , ESTE CREDITO LO NECESITA  COMPRAR MATERIALES DE CONSTRUCCION COMO PERLINES, CINZ Y PAGAR  MANO DE OBRA ,PARA REPARAR  PARTE        DE SU VIVIENDA QUE SE ENCUENTRA EN MAL ESTADO..
texts.en: Ms. E. is single and works as a data recorder.  She is in charge of three other people.  This will be her third loan with CEPRODEL.  She is grateful for the support and the disbursements approved by CEPRODEL.  As part of her home is in need of repair, she plans to use the requested loan to buy construction materials, such as support rafters and metal sheeting for her roof.  The loan will also be used to pay the labor costs.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials

loans.name: San Carlos Group

texts.es:
ALCANCIA COMUNAL “SAN CARLOS”

La señora Violeta 47 años es madre D. 2 hijos, D. los cuales uno ya es independiente, ella vive con su esposo y con el menor D. sus hijos, Violeta es cliente D. EDAPROSPO-PROSPERIDAD desD. hace ya 2 años. Ella tiene el cargo D. presidenta D. su grupo, fue elegida por las socias por su carisma y su responsabilidad.
Violeta, tiene su negocio llamado “Confecciones Viole” en el que se dedica a la confección D. zapatos exclusivamente para mujeres D. todas las edades, lleva en este negocio 16 años, con ayuda D. su esposo con quien comparten tareas, mientras que él se dedica a la confección D. los zapatos, ella se encarga D. la promoción y venta, tanto en su casa como también ambulatoriamente y ocacionalmente hace visitas a sus clientes mas conocidos.
Violeta y su esposo han trabajado duro, y con su esfuerzo lograron comprar su casa, construir el segundo piso D. ella, y dar estudios superiores a sus hijos.
El préstamo actual, lo invertirá en la compra D. materiales, herramientas, etc, para su negocio.
Ella sueña con terminar D. construir su casa hasta un tercer piso asi lograr ampliar su taller, comprar un auto para ahorrar tiempo y dinero en la compra D. materiales, y ver profesional a su menor hijo.
texts.en:
Community Bank "San Carlos"

Señora Violeta is 47 years old and the mother of two children, one of whom is independent. She lives with her husband and the younger of their children. Violeta has been a client of Edaprospo-Prosperidad for about two years. She has the position of president of the group. She was elected by the members for her charisma and responsibility.

Violeta has a business called "Viole Confeciones" [Creations by Violet] in which she works making shoes exclusively for women of all ages. She has been doing this work for 16 years with the help of her husband with whom she shares tasks. While he works making the shoes, she is in charge of promotion and sales, in her home as well as walking around. She occasionally makes visits to her best known clients. Violeta and her husband have worked hard and with their effort they were able to buy a house, construct a second floor, and proviD. higher level studies for their children.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of materials, tools, etc, for their business. She dreams of finishing the construction of their house including a third floor so to be able to expand the workshop, of being able to buy a car to save time and money in the purchase of materials, and of seeing their younger son with professional work.

loans.use: To buy materials and supplies for making shoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction materials (stone, sand, paint and metal barring)

loans.name: Benito Enrique

texts.es:
El Sr. Z. trabaja para la alcaldía de la paz centro desde hace 9 años como encargado de proyectos
Es el quinto crédito que solicita en ceprodel este crédito lo utilizara para gastos personales
En la actualidad está casado y junto a su esposa quien es profesora comparten los gastos del hogar ya que sus hijos estudian los cuales son tres
Comenta que los créditos con ceprodel le han ayudado ya que gracias a ellos logro terminar de construir su casa
texts.en:
Sr. Z. has worked for the city of La Paz for 9 years.  
He is in charge of projects. 
This is his fifth Ceprodel loan and he wants it to pay personal expenses.  
He and his wife, a teacher, share household expenses and school fees for their three children. 
He says that Ceprodel loans have helped him build his house.

loans.use: to pay for personal expenses.

loans.name: Karen Auxiliadora

texts.es: LA SEÑORA R.  LABORA COMO ASISTENTE ADMINISTRATIVO ,ES  SOLTERA ,TIENE  UNA PERSONAS  A SU CARGO, ES  EL SEPTIMO CREDITO  QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE EL APOYO  QUE  LE HA BRINDADO  CEPRODEL  CON LOS DESEMBOLSO QUE LE HAN APROBADO , ESTE CREDITO LO NECESITA PARA PAGAR TRAMITE LEGALES  DE PROPIEDAD Y  COMPRAR MATERIALES DE CONSTRUCCION COMO CEMENTO,BLOQUE,HIERRO,ARENA Y PAGAR  MANO DE OBRA ,PARA LEVANTAR TAPIA DEL PATIO    DE SU VIVIENDA ESTADO.
texts.en:
Sra. Karen R. works as an administrative assistant. She is single and has one dependent. This is the seventh loan she has received from CEPRODEL. She is grateful for the financial support CEPRODEL has provided.

This loan will be used to pay to have the legal papers filed for her property. She will also buy construction materials such as cement blocks, iron, sand, as well as pay for labor to build a patio wall for her home.

loans.use: To pay for materials and labor as well as the filing fees for her property.

loans.name: Maria Neris

texts.es: Este cliente es originario de la mina del limón es una profesora de primaria a la cual tiene24 años de impartir clase en este lugar y ella tiene 30 años de vivir en esta  localidad y el crédito lo quiere para terminar de mejorar un cuarto a su hijo con el fin de crearle condiciones  ya que con esto se va a sentir mas cómodo ella solo tiene un hijo al que ha venido apoyando en la preparación académica hasta lograr coronar una carrera.
texts.en: Maria Neris is originally from Mina Del Limón.  She is an elementary school teacher and has been in this profession for 24 years.  Maria has lived in this community for 30 years.  This loan will be used to finish the improvements to her son’s bedroom so that he will be more comfortable.  Maria only has one child and supports his academic preparation so that he can pursue a career.

loans.use: To pay for materials and labor so that she can complete the construction of her son's bedroom.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase materials for painting her house and replacing the roof.

loans.name: Rosa Paulina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosa Paulina; ella tiene 34 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con la crianza de sus hijos, la socia es ama de casa y su pareja trabaja en el negocio de transporte y juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere tener un negocio propio. La socia solicita el préstamo para hacer arreglar su casa y comprar materiales de construccion como cemento,yeso y arena.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosa Paulina is a member of the Communal Bank “Santa Rosita de Ayllupampa” which is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

She is 34 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children.  Rosa Paulina divides her time between her daily activities and raising her children.  She is a homemaker while her partner works for a transportation business.  Together they help their children move forward.  Rosa Paulina wants to have her own business.  She is requesting this loan to improve her home and purchase construction materials such as cement, plaster, and sand. 

Rosa Paulina is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to improve her home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase materials for painting her house and replacing the roof.

loans.name: Isabel Del Carmen

texts.es: LA SEÑORA O.  LABORA COMO SECRETARIA EJECUTIVA ,ES  SOLTERA ,TIENE  UNA PERSONAS  A SU CARGO, ES  EL SEPTIMO CREDITO  QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE EL APOYO  QUE  LE HA BRINDADO  CEPRODEL  CON LOS DESEMBOLSO QUE LE HAN APROBADO , ESTE CREDITO LO NECESITA PARA COMPRAR MATERIALES DE CONSTRUCCION COMO CERAMICA, PORCELANA, BOOM Y PAGAR  MANO DE OBRA  PARA PISO  DE SU VIVIENDA.
texts.en:
Sra. Isabel O. works as an executive secretary. She is single and has one dependent. This is the seventh loan she has received from CEPRODEL. She is grateful for the financial support that CEPRODEL has given to her.

This loan will be used to buy construction materials such as ceramics, porcelain, insulation foam, as well as pay for labor to install a floor in her home.

loans.use: To pay for materials and labor required to install a floor in her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase clothing, shoes, and other products.

loans.name: Fudiatu

texts.en:
Fudiatu is 32 years old and married with two children, ages 1 and 3. She runs a store in Fullah Town in Sierra Leone.

Fudiatu has been in this business for two years and sells rice, onions, maggi, and flour at her store. Her store is her only source of income. She says that the main challenges to her business are inflation and deflation.

She requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more food items. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her expand her business. In the future, she would like to be a good business importer.

loans.use: To purchase rice, onions, maggi, and flour.

loans.name: Noel Antonio

texts.es: EL SEÑOR P. LABORA COMO DOCENTE TECNICO DE LA BORATORIO ES CASADO, TIENE  DOS PERSONA A SU CARGO, ESTE ES EL CUARTO CREDITO QUE CEPRODEL LE OTORGA, AGRADECE LA OPROTUNIDAD QUE LE BRINDA, ESTE DESEMBOLSO LO NECESITA PARA CANCELAR DEUDA Y PARA COMPRA DE  MATERIALES DE CONSTRUCCION CERAMICA, PORCELANA, MANO DE OBRA, PARA PONER PISO EN SU VIVIENDA.
texts.en: Sr. Noel Antonio P. works at a laboratory as a technical instructor.  He is married and has two dependents.  This is the fourth loan he has received from CEPRODEL.  He is grateful for the opportunity that has been given to him.  The funds will be used to repay a debt and to purchase construction materials such as ceramic, porcelain, as well as pay for labor in order to install a floor in his home.

loans.use: To pay for needed materials and labor for installing a floor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase construction materials and pay for labor to make home improvements.

loans.name: Consuelo Del Carmen

texts.es:
Consuelo del Carmen López, es casada con dos hijos  uno en edad escolar y el otro en la universidad a los que tiene el deber de mantener en sus estudios. Se dedica a atender su propio negocio desde hace 15 años ubicado en el mercado Israel  de Managua. 
Desde que inicio el negocio doña Consuelo se ha caracterizado por ser una persona esforzada y eficiente, ella inicio su negocio en un local del mercado y desde  entonces a mantenido su negocio y su núcleo familiar gracias a los múltiples esfuerzo.
Una de las necesidades que atraviesa ella es la urgencia de remodelar  su negocio y comprar los  siguientes; pintura, inodoros y materiales de construcción para el mejoramiento de los servicios higiénicos.  
Es  por este motivo que acude a cerpodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito que le permita mejorar su local y así poderles brindar un mejor servicio a sus cliente y satisfacer las demanda de sus clientes con el único fin de obtener los ingresos para mantener su hogar  continuar brindándole la educación a sus hijos.  Ha trabajado dieciocho créditos con ceprodel todos para su negocio.
texts.en:
Consuelo del Carmen López is married. She has two children in school and another one attending the university, so she is responsible for helping them with their studies. For the past fifteen years, she has been managing her own business at the Israel Market in Managua. Since starting her business, Doña Consuelo has been known as a determined and efficient person. From the beginning, she has been able to maintain both her business and her family as a result of her multiple efforts.

One of her urgent needs is to remodel her business and purchase the following items: paint, toilets, and construction materials to improve her public bathroom facilities. For this reason, she approached CEPRODEL so that she could benefit from a loan to improve her establishment and provide better services to her customers. By satisfying demand, she will be able to generate income to maintain her household and continue providing her children with an education. Consuelo has received eighteen loans from CEPRODEL. All of them were used for her business.

loans.use: To purchase paint, toilets, and construction materials to improve her public bathroom facilities.

loans.name: Albina

texts.es: Albina, de 40 años, vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposo Rolando de 41, quien es agricultor,  y de sus 2 hijos menores, de los 3 que tiene, debido a que el mayor estudia en la ciudad y es independiente. Esta trabajadora mujer se dedica a la agricultura, siembra flores como el gladiolo, asimismo lechuga y arvejas, junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Todos los días las faenas agrícolas son muy tediosas, pero dice que el trabajo le gusta mucho porque sabe bien todas las técnicas para sembrar en cantidad y con calidad; lo que no le gusta mucho es que muchas veces toda una siembra se pierde por las plagas, pero con la practica se aprende como sembrar cada vez mejor. Dice que cuando es tiempo de cosecha trabaja más para recoger toda la producción, pero como es una labor conjunta con los miembros de su familia se hace en menos tiempo. Como es una dama muy emprendedora que siempre ha trabajado para salir adelante, para el futuro tiene planeado sembrar en mayor cantidad, pues quiere aumentar sus ganancias. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y esta muy agradecida con todas las personas que hicieron posible el crédito que le permitirá continuar trabajando, además dice que esta muy satisfecha con el trabajo de su grupo, pues esta compuesto por  mujeres trabajadoras como ella, que buscan salir adelante a base de mucho esfuerzo y trabajo. Albina tiene pensado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de abono, así como semillas de flores de gladiolos, que necesita para la próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Albina, 40, lives in her own house with her husband, Rolando, 41, who is a farmer, and their two minor children.  They have three children total but the oldest is studying in the city and is independent.

This hard working woman is a farmer.  She grows flowers, like gladiolas, and also lettuce and peas with her husband and children.  The daily farm chores are very tedious but she says that she likes the work very much because she knows all the planting techniques needed to plant in quantity and in quality.  What she doesn’t like very much is that the crops are sometimes lost due to infestations but with practice one learns how to plant better each time.  She says that during harvest time she works more to gather the entire crop but, since it’s a job done together with her family members, it’s completed in less time.  Because she’s an enterprising woman who has always worked hard to get ahead, she plans to plant larger amounts in the future because she wants to increase profits.

This is her 4th loan with MFP and she is very grateful to the people who made the loan possible that will allow her to continue working.  She also says that she’s very satisfied with the work of her group because it’s made up of hard working women like her who seek to get ahead through their own efforts and work.  Albina plans to use the requested loan to buy manure and gladiola seeds that she needs for the next planting cycle.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure and gladiola seeds.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Felicitas; ella tiene 35 años de edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chicha (bebida a base de maíz), también vende jora que es ingrediente que se usa para preparar la chicha, ella vende en su casa, la socia quiere construir su casa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como cemento y yeso para su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Felicitas, 35, is a member of the SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA community bank in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.

Sra. Felicitas is married and has 5 children.  She operates a business making and selling chicha (a maize-based drink) and jora (an ingredient for making chicha).  She operates the business from her house.  She wants to add on to the house so she is applying for a loan so that she can buy concrete, plaster and other construction materials.

Sra. Felicitas is grateful for your help and committed to repaying the loan in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: to buy materials for house construction.

loans.name: Ana Luz

texts.es: Ana Luz A. U., es viuda con dos hijos pero ninguno dependen de ella solamente tiene un nieto que esta bajo su cargo en edad escolar al que tiene el deber de mantener en sus estudios. Se dedica a atender su propio negocio desde hace 10 años en la ciudad de Managua. Desde que inicio el negocio doña Ana se ha caracterizado por ser una persona esforzada y eficiente, ella inicio su negocio vendiendo ambulante y desde  entonces a mantenido su negocio y su núcleo familiar gracias a los múltiples esfuerzo. Una de las necesidades que atraviesa ella es la urgencia de comprar los productos de su negocio como lo son; la lotería. Es  por este motivo que acude a cerpodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito que le permita comprar  productos a sus proveedores y así continuar comercializándolos para satisfacer las demanda de sus clientes con el único fin de obtener los ingresos para mantener su hogar  continuar brindándole la educación a su nieto.  Ha trabajado diez créditos con ceprodel todos para su negocio.
texts.en: Ana Luz A. U. is a widow with two chilren.  Neither of her children are dependent but she does have a grandson in her care.  He is school-aged and it is her duty to keep him in school.  She has made her living with her own business in the city of Managua for 10 years.  Since she started the business, doña Ana has been known for being hard-working and efficient.  She began selling her merchandise on the street, and thanks to multiple efforts she has been able to maintain her business and her nuclear family since then.  One of the needs that she comes across is an urgency to purchase the product of her business, lottery tickets. This is the reason she turns to Ceprodel, to have the benefit of a loan which allows her to purchase products from her purveyors to satisfy her customer's demand.  Her only goal is to earn an income that will support her household and provide her grandson with an education.  She has worked with Ceprodel on ten loans, all of which have been for her business.

loans.use: to purchase lottery tickets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es: Aurelia tiene 40 años, es una mujer muy amable y sencilla, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Guzmán de 39 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. En los verdes campos del poblado de Yaroka (Distrito de la provincia de Tarma), Aurelia cultiva papa, gladiolo y arveja, desde entonces todas las mañanas sin importarle las condiciones del clima sale a trabajar en sus tierras, ya que es la única fuente de ingresos para su familia. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 30 años de experiencia y considera que lo más difícil es tener que fumigar sus cultivos por pueden afectar su salud. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras para incrementar su producción. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP y está ahorrando para pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, donde se siente muy contenta. Con los dos mil ochocientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono y fertilizantes para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Aurelia is 40 years old.  She is a very kind and simple woman who lives in her own home together with her husband, 39 year-old Guzmán, and her three beloved children who she would like to provide with a better quality of life.

In the green fields of the village of Yaroka, in Tarma province, Aurelia grows potatoes, gladioli and peas.  Every day, regardless of the weather, she goes out to work on her land since this is the only source of income for her family.  What Aurelia most enjoys about her work is cultivating her land and she does this with a lot of care.  She has 30 years experience in this business and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be having to spray her crops because it can affect her health.  Over time, she would like to buy more land in order to increase her production.

This is Aurelia's fourth loan from MFP and she is saving up so that she will be able to make her repayments on time since she doesn't want to cause trouble for the other members of her community bank where she feels very happy.  Aurelia will use the 2,000 Peruvian soles she is requesting to buy more manure and fertilizers for her crops.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: Norma del Carmen V. P., es casada con dos hijos que están bajo su cargo en edad escolar al que tiene el deber de mantener en sus estudios. Se dedica a atender su propio negocio desde hace 10 años en la ciudad de Managua. Desde que inicio el negocio doña Norma se ha caracterizado por ser una persona esforzada y eficiente, ella inicio su negocio en un tramo del mercado Israel y desde  entonces a mantenido su negocio y su núcleo familiar gracias a los múltiples esfuerzo. Una de las necesidades que atraviesa ella es la urgencia de comprar los productos de su negocio como lo son; de  gaseosa, jugos, pasteles y repostería. Es  por este motivo que acude a cerpodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito que le permita comprar  productos a sus proveedores y así continuar comercializándolos para satisfacer las demanda de sus clientes con el único fin de obtener los ingresos para mantener su hogar  continuar brindándole la educación a sus hijos.  Ha trabajado cinco créditos con ceprodel todos para su negocio.
texts.en: Norma del Carmen V. P. is married and has two school-aged children in her care.  It is her duty to keep them in school.  She has made her living through her own business in the city of Managua for 10 years.  Since she started the business, doña Norma has been hard-working and efficient.  Her business started in an area of the Israel Market.  Thanks to her multiple efforts, she has maintained her business and her nuclear family since then.  One of the needs that she comes across is an urgency to purchase products for her business, like sodas, juices, cakes and confections.  This is the reason she turned to Ceprodel, for the benefit of the loan that allows her to purchase products from the purveyors to satisfy her customer's demand.  Her only goal is to earn enough income to support her household and provide her children with an education. She has worked with Ceprodel for five loans, all of which were for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sodas, juices, cakes and confections.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase of construction materials for his home.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Paulina; ella tiene 42 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras como zanahorias, tomates, cebollas, lechugas entre otros, la socia vende las verduras en el mercado de Urubamba, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos. La socia solicita el préstamo para verduras al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Paulina is a member of the community bank Santa Rosita de Ayllupampa, located in the Urubamba district in the Urubamba province and Cusco department.

Paulina is 42 years old, married, and has three children.  She balances her daily activities with a business that sells vegetables like carrots, tomatoes, onions, lettuce, and others.  She sells vegetables in the market in Urubamba.  She works from 7:00am until 4:00pm.  This business is helping her improve the lives of her children.  She is asking for this loan to purchase vegetables at wholesale.

She is happy with this loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es: Elvira, de 34 años, vive en su casa propia al lado de su esposo Juan de 43 años, quien es agricultor, y de sus 3 hijos menores de edad, que aún estudian en el colegio. Bajo el cielo azul de la sierra peruana, esta trabajadora mujer se despierta cada mañana para vigilar sus cultivos, pues siembra junto a su esposo, papa, arvejas, lechugas y gladiolo. Sabe que el trabajo agrícola requiere de mucha dedicación, para lograr recoger una productiva cosecha. Cuando la producción esta lista para vender, la traslada al mercado mayorista de la ciudad donde los comerciantes que siempre le compran le ofrecen buenos precios, que le permiten obtener regulares ganancias. Es por esta razón que le gusta mucho trabajar en el campo porque todo el sacrificio tiene su recompensa cuando puede brindarle una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos, así como todo lo necesario  para que se eduquen. Elvira sueña que sus hijos lleguen a estudiar una profesión en la ciudad y no descansará hasta cumplirlo; y como es una mujer muy emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado sembrar en mayor cantidad, además quiere instalar un negocio de abarrotes. Es el tercer crédito con MFP y esta muy agradecida con todas las personas que hicieron posible el crédito que le permitirá continuar trabajando para salir adelante, además esta muy satisfecha con el trabajo de su grupo porque esta integrado por damas muy responsables en el pago puntual de sus cuotas. Elvira tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de semilla de arvejas, y fertilizantes para asegurar sus tierras para la próxima siembra y así lograr  una cosecha productiva.
texts.en:
Elvira is 34 years old and lives in her own home with her husband Juan, who is 43 years old and a farmer, and their three children who go to school.  

Under the blue skies of the Peruvian mountains, this hard-working woman wakes up every morning to care for her crops.  She and her husband grow potatoes, peas, lettuce, and gladiolus.  She knows that farming requires a lot of dedication to achieve a productive harvest.  When the crops are ready to be sold, she takes them to the wholesale market in the city where merchants always buy them.  She offers good prices which allows her to earn income regularly.  

For this reason, she likes to work in the fields because all of the sacrifices pay off when she can offer her children a better quality of life and everything they need to become educated.  Elvira dreams that her children will learn a profession in the city and she will not rest until they accomplish it.  Since she is an enterprising woman, in the future, she plans to plant crops in larger quantities, and she also wants to start a grocery store.

This is her third loan with MFP, and she is very thankful to everyone who made the loan possible because it will allow her to continue working to get ahead.  She is also very satisfied with the work of her group because it is made up of responsible women who make their payments on time.

Elvira plans to invest this loan in the purchase of pea seeds and fertilizers to prepare her fields for the next planting and achieve a productive harvest.

loans.use: to purchase pea seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Alicia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Alicia del Carmen A., es casada con una hija que está bajo su cargo en edad escolar a la que tiene el deber de mantener en sus estudios. Se dedica a atender su propio negocio desde hace 10 años en la ciudad de Managua. 
Desde que inicio el negocio doña Alicia se ha caracterizado por ser una persona esforzada y eficiente, ella inicio su negocio en un quiosco cerrado y desde  entonces a mantenido su negocio y su núcleo familiar gracias a los múltiples esfuerzo.
 Una de las necesidades que atraviesa ella es la urgencia de comprar los productos de su negocio como lo son; la  gaseosa, jugos, repostería y productos para la elaboración de sus comida.
 Es  por este motivo que acude nuevamente a cerpodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito que le permita comprar  productos a sus proveedores y así continuar comercializándolos para satisfacer las demanda de sus clientes con el único fin de obtener los ingresos para mantener su hogar  continuar brindándole la educación a sus hijos.  Ha trabajado cuatro créditos con ceprodel todos para su negocio.
texts.en:
Alicia del Carmen A. is married and has one daughter in her care. The child is of school age, so she has to keep up with her studies. Alicia has had her own business for 10 years in the city of Managua.

Since she began the business, Alicia has been characterized as a hard working and efficient person. She started her business in a vacant newsstand, and since then she has maintained her business and her family thanks to the fruits of her labor.

One of her urgent needs is to purchase items for her business such as sodas, juices, pastries, and ingredients for making meals.

This is why she has once again approached Kiva partner Ceprodel to request a loan that will allow her to purchase items from her suppliers so that she can continue selling them and satisfy customer demand. Her one goal is to have income to maintain her home and continue paying for her child's education. She has had four loans through Ceprodel, all of which were used for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sodas, juice, pastries, and ingredients for meals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Carlos José

texts.es: En la ciudad de Managua, El   Sr. Carlos José J. Reyes, se dedica  arduamente a laborar como agente de seguridad  dedicándose a esta labor desde hace cinco  años, es casado y con un hijo al que tiene que proporcionarles las condiciones necesarias para que se desarrolle. Una de las necesidades que el  Sr. Carlos  atraviesa hoy en día es que debe mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda debido a que ha estado en malas condiciones por lo que a tomado la sabia decisión de iniciar la obra de mejora. Es por ese motivo que acude a ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como: zinc, perlines y pintura, Para realizar la mejora de  la vivienda realizando  el cambio de techo  en su casa de habitación y pintarla. Por medio de esta obra brindara mejores condiciones de vida a su hijo. Es importante destacar que por medio de la realización de esta obra, le proporcionara a su familia un techo digno donde vivir y con todas las condiciones necesarias para el desarrollo de sus hijos.
texts.en: In the city of Managua, Carlos José J. R.works hard as a security guard; he has been in this line of work for five years. He is married and has a son whom he has to provide for so that he will grow up well. One of the things Carlos needs right now is to improve living conditions and his home because it has been in bad shape, so he decided to start working to improve it. It is for this reason that he has approached Kiva partner Ceprodel to request a loan to purchase construction materials such as zinc, beams, and paint. To make improvements to his home, he will rebuild the roof and paint the house. This will allow him to improve his son's quality of life. It is important to point out that by doing this work, he will give his family a dignified place to live that will satisfy his children's needs as they grow up.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as zinc, beams, and paint

loans.name: Irene Irma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE AYLLUPAMPA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra.
