She plans to go to Zambia to purchase suits and jeans for resale in Zimbabwe with the loan she is applying for from MicroKing. She envisions herself operating a huge clothing shop in town.

loans.use: To purchase clothes from Zambia for resale in Zimbabwe

loans.name: Sabougnouma. Group

texts.fr:
Les quatre membres du groupe SABOUGNOUMA sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 33 ans, et  en moyenne 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des  familles monogames à HAMDALLAYE un des quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso (3ème région administrative du Mali). 
Elles sont à leur première collaboration avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle. 
AMINATA S. fait le commerce de friperies dans ce groupe de femmes et compte acheter avec son  prêt, 3 balles de friperie, grand marché de Sikasso ville. Elle les revend à une place fixe au marché de Hamdallaye de la ville  de Sikasso, de façon ambulante avec sa fille et en famille, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes, au comptant. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 15.250FCFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son intérêt et l’autre pour  épargne.
texts.en:
The four members of the Sabougnouma groups are married women, averaging 33 years of age, with four children . They all live in monogamous families in Hamdallaye, a working-class district in the city of Sikasso (the third administrative region of Mali).

They are on their first collaboration with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution, with the goal of meeting customer demand.

Aminata S. is a group member who sells second-hand clothing. She plans to purchase three bales of second-hand clothing at the big market of Sikasso. She  resells at her fixed vending spot at the Hamdallaye market, as a street vendor, aided by her daughter, and out of her home, to a client base composed of men and women, for cash.

She plans to achieve an average monthly income of 15,250 West African Francs, a part of which will be used to repay her loan interest, and a part of savings.

loans.use: to purchase second-hand clothing

loans.name: Anargul's Group

texts.en:
Anargul B., 53, is the leader of this group. She resides in Kadamjai, a small town in the Southern Kyrgyzstan. Out of her four children, her 11 year old daughter is the only one financially dependent upon her. 

For the past twelve years, Anargul has been running a business of baking and retailing bread and other baked goods. She uses unique recipes taught to her by her mother. This allows her bakery to stand out from other bakeries by its special taste quality. Anargul has worked out strategies of cost cutting and a more efficient production, which makes her bread affordable and allows her to acquire competitive advantage. Anargul thanks her friend, whose advice she followed. 

A monthly income of 4,000 soms allowed her family to purchase an automobile, which helps Anargul’s husband start cab driving. She plans to use the loan as an investment in the business. For the generated profits she would like to build a small grocery store.  

         --- Where Did This Loan Come From? ---

This loan is brought to you by Mol Bulak Finance (MBF), a young, ambitious and socially-focused Microfinance Institution in Kyrgyzstan. 
MBF is strongly committed to the principles of sustainable development and upholds the triple bottom line – People (building human capital and taking care of its customers as well as society), Planet (keeping environmentally friendly) and Profit (earning revenue to expand autonomously). MBF is the only Microfinance Institute in Kyrgyzstan that delivers its services to customers 365 days a year. To learn more about MBF and view a Video presentation about the organization, please visit: http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=135 
								
If you would like to support and learn more about Kyrgyzstan and microfinance in Central Asia, please join our Lending Team - Supporters of Kyrgyzstan – Mol Bulak Finance at http://kiva.org/team/kyrgyzstan. Members will get special updates and news from Kiva Fellows in Kyrgyzstan and from the MBF staff.

loans.use: to purchase flour.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en: Anahit V. works as a nurse. Nonetheless, the main income for the family comes from keeping livestock. In the village, where the unemployment rate is very high, it is very important to develop local agriculture to ensure income and work for the local youth. Anahit and her husband plan to grow their business. They require this loan to purchase feed for their cattle and to purchase more livestock. Anahit’s son is currently serving in the Army and, upon his return, he will join the family business and develop it further.

loans.use: to purchase cattle feed and livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to expand his business, repair his old store and cover their housing expenses.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.fr: Monsieur Daniel  est âgé de 30 ans. Il est marié à une secrétaire et à 01 enfant en charge. Il est éleveur et  a commencé son activité en 2005. Daniel fait son approvisionnement au Ghana et en Hollande et l’activité se déroule à Tabligbo (une ville du Togo). Il désire ce premier prêt pour la construction de bâtiment d’élevage, l’achat de 800 coquelets,  l’achat de 06 sachets de produits et de 15 cartons de nourriture. Il emploi 01 personne et désire réaliser de bénéfice  pour acheter un terrain.
texts.en: Mr. Daniels is 30 years  old. He is married to a secretary and has one dependent  child. He raises poultry, having  launched this business in 2005. He stocks up in Ghana and Holland, and his business is based in Tabligbo (a town in Togo). He is seeking this first loan in order to purchase a rearing house, 800 birds,  six packets of [veterinary?] products and 15 boxes of feed. He employs one person and hopes to raise enough revenue to purchase a land plot.

loans.use: to purchase 800 birds, six packets of veterinary products and 15 boxes of feed

loans.name: Zamile Group

texts.en:
Bhekisile is 50 years old. She is married and has 5 children between the ages of 15 and 30. Only one of her children now attends school. She also looks after 4 relatives staying with her. In the photo above she is raising her hand. 

Bhekisile has been in this business for 2 years. She sells matches, candles, paraffin, and phone airtime from her home in Eshowe, South Africa. She also earns income from the government’s child support grant.

She requested this loan through WDB and KIVA to buy matches, candles, paraffin and airtime. She says that the main challenges to her business are customers who buy on credit and then refuse to pay.

In five years time, she would like to see her business grow and have more clients, which will result in making more profit for her business. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her renovate her home and buy a car for her kids.
 
She appreciates WDB and Kiva for helping her and hopes to achieve more.

loans.use: To buy candles, matches, paraffin and airtime.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more more books to sell.

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en:
Alphonsine is 29 years old, and she is married with three children between 2 months and 9 years old. She has owned her small store selling spare parts for about three years. She opens her business from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. every day except Sunday.

Alphonsine has now requested a Kiva loan so that she can expand her store by stocking enough spare parts, and some other goods which seem to be in high demand in her business area. Alphonsine plans to start saving, as well as improving her family's situation. With any profits that she earns, she plans to reinvest in her business and to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more spare parts to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy gara-lapper-making materials (inks, caustic soda, powder, white cotton cloths, etc.) in large quantities in order to produce more gara cloths for sale

loans.name: Aslan

texts.ru:
Aslan H. yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Mahbudlu-1, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. On jenat i imeyet 3 detey. Aslan 54 qoda. On uje 12 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom. Eto uje vtoraya ssuda Aslana v perviy raz on bral 2500$ za etu ssudu on ochen blagodaren lendderam i Kive.
Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2300 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya razvitiya svoyeqo biznessa. On delayet kefir i yogurt iz moloka i prodayet ix v maqazini.
texts.en:
Aslan H. is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person). He is a refugee from Mahbudlu-1 who now lives in the Fuzuli region with his family.  He is married and has three children.  Aslan is 54 years old.  He has been a herdsman for twelve years.  This is the second loan Aslan has taken.  The first was for $2500, and he is very grateful to Kiva lenders for it.

Now, he needs 2300 AZN to buy cows which will expand his business.  He makes kefir and yogurt and sells them in shops.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy shoes, body creams, toothpaste, etc. in large quantities to add to her business

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur F. is 23 years old. He lives in Tsovagyugh Village, an area of Sevan, with his wife and his one-year-old son.
 
For about five years, Artur worked as a waiter in a restaurant. Now Artur and his wife engage in farming. They raise cows, sheep, and chickens. Artur also has been running his own trading business in a coach cabin, where he sells food and beach accessories. Artur has been managing his shop since 2009 and, thanks to trading and farming, he can support his family and was also able to construct a new and more comfortable shop for his trading.
 
Artur is asking for a 500,000-AMD loan to place stall boards and showcases in his new shop and to buy beverages, food, candy, and sausages to resell.

loans.use: to place stall boards and showcases in his new shop and to buy beverages, food, candy, and sausages to resell

loans.name: Marie Jeanne

texts.en:
Marie Jeanne is 44 years old and is married with three children between the ages of 4 and 14. She owns a small business sewing clothes. This business is well organized. Marie Jeanne has four months of experience. Her business is open from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m. every day, and she currently employs two people to help her. 

Marie Jeanne has now requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to increase her business by purchasing a new machine for sewing. Marie Jeanne will be able to satisfy her customers, which will help her to earn more profits. With these profits, she will reinvest in her business and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy a new machine for sewing

loans.name: Firaynaz

texts.ru:
Firaynaz zamujem i imeyet 3 detey. Ona yavlyayetsya IDP personom, pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoimi detmi i mujem. Firaynaz M. rodilas v 1961 qodu. Ona uje 9 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom. 
Seychas ona nujdayetsya v 2300 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya uvelicheniya skota i molochnoqo produkta dlya prodaji. Ona prodayet molochniye produkti u sebya doma.
texts.en:
Firaynaz is married and has three children.  She is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person). She is a refugee from Fuzuli city who now lives in the Fuzuli region with her children and husband.  Firaynaz M. was born in 1961.  

She has worked as a herdsman for nine years.  Now, she needs 2300 AZN to buy cows to expand her herd and increase her milk production.  She sells dairy products from her home.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Marthe

texts.en: Marthe is 39 years old, married and has five children who range in age from two to 20 years old. She owns a small restaurant where she sells food and beverages, including bananas, biscuits, tea, eggs and water. She has been in this business for more than four years and currently has two employees. She gets up at 6 a.m. and works until 9 p.m. every day, and is applying for this loan to buy more food for her restaurant, including bread, milk and sugar. She hopes to continue investing in and expanding her business.

loans.use: To expand her restaurant.

loans.name: Clementine

texts.en:
Clementine is 40 years old and is married, with five children between 3 and 18 years old. Her business is well-organized. Clementine is a tailor for both men`s and women`s clothes. She employs two people in her business. Her business operates from 8am until 7pm every day.   She has one year's experience in this business.

Clementine has requested a loan from KIVA lenders in order to purchase more materials for her sewing.   With any profit, Clementine will expand her business and she will be able to reinvest in this business.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her sewing

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buys dishes, rubber bowls, spoons, cups, etc., in large quantity to add to her business

loans.name: Donatha

texts.en:
Donatha is 29 years old and is married, with two children between 6 and 8 years old. Donatha sells second hand items like sheets, covers, etc., in the market.   Her business is clean. She runs her business from 8am until 7pm every day except on the weekend, and she has five years of experience.

She has requested a loan from KIVA lenders in order to purchase more second hand items, such as sheets, covers, etc., to sell.  With this profit, Donatha will reinvest in her business and save for her future.  She plans to buy her own house .

loans.use: to purchase more second hand items to sell, such as sheets, covers, etc.

loans.name: Jeanne D`arc

texts.en: Jeanne d`Arc is 27 years old, married and has two young children. For the last nine years, she has made a living by running a small variety store where she sells items such as lotions, soap and toothpaste. Her business is well-organized and open every day from 5 a.m. to 9 p.m. She has applied for a loan from Kiva and Vision Finance Company to buy more items to sell to her customers. She hopes to expand her business so that she can save for the future and provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Hadija

texts.en: Hadija is married and has three children, two boys and one girl. Two of children are still in school while the third is married. For the last four years, she has made a living in her home, selling soft drinks to neighbors and passersby.  She is applying for this loan from Kiva and Yehu to improve her living standards by buying a refrigerator in which she can store drinks before sale. In the future, she dreams of opening a retail shop.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator in which to store soft drinks before sale.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Victor Manuel; el tiene 28 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de internet, el socio trabaja en una empresa en el área de almacén y el negocio de internet trabaja junto con su hermano y de esta manera untos salen adelante, el socio quiere mejorar el servicio de internet. El  socio solicita el préstamo para implementar el negocio de internet,el comprara mesas y sillas y tambien algunos repuestos para las computadoras.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Victor Manuel is a member of the “LAS AMISTOSAS” community bank which is located in Urcos district, in Quispicanchis province, in Cusco department.

Victor Manuel is 28 years old and single.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his Internet business.  He works for a wholesale business and runs an Internet business together with his brother.  In this way they get ahead in life.  Victor Manuel would like to improve his Internet service.  He is requesting a loan for his Internet business to purchase tables, chairs, and some spare parts for the computers.  He is happy to be receiving his loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs for his internet business, as well as spare parts for the computers

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en: Jacqueline is 39 years old, married and has three children who range in age from 13 to 22. She also cares for a fourth child who is 22 years old. Jacqueline makes a living by running a well-organized business where she sells oil. She has been in this line of work for the last seven years, and runs her business from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. every day except Sunday. She has applied for a loan from Kiva to expand her business by buying more oil to sell to her customers. She plans to use the additional income made possible by this loan to expand her business and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: To buy more oil to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Miguel Angel; el tiene 26 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de internet y también se dedica al trabajo como agente de seguridad en el seguro social del cusco, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el servicio de internet. El  socio solicita el préstamo para implementar el negocio de internet.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel, 26, is a member of the “LAS AMISTOSAS” (The Friendly Ones) communal bank located in Urcos District which belongs to Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.

He is single and alternates his daily chores with and Internet access business; he also works as a Security Guard at Cusco Social Security.  He wants to expand and improve his Internet access business and needs a loan to set it up.  He is happy about the loan and commits to repay his installments.

loans.use: to set up his Internet access business.

loans.name: Livia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Livia; ella tiene 33 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, ella lo lleva al lugares como Puerto Maldonado y los vende en forma ambulatoria, por medio de este negocio la socia S. adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere tener un lugar donde pueda vender las frutas y verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas y verduras al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "The Friends". It is located in the district of Urcos, belonging to the province of Quispicanchis and the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Livia. She is 33 years old, married common-law, and she has 2 children. She alternates her daily activities with her fruit and vegetable business. She takes her products to places like Puerto Maldonado and she sells them itinerantly. It is through this business that she is able to support her children. She wants to have a place from where to sell her fruits and vegetables. She requests a loan to purchase fruits and vegetables in wholesale.

She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables in wholesale

loans.name: Sabeti

texts.en:
Sabeti is a widow with six children.   One attends school and the others graduated from school. They own a house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees, food and clothing. For the past five years, she has operated a charcoal selling business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby.

Sabeti faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation in her business. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future. With the Kshs 30,000, she wants to purchase 20 sacks of charcoal and pay for transport. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase 20 sacks of charcoal and pay for transport.

loans.name: Soline

texts.en:
Soline is 41 years old and is married, with four children between 10 and 18 years old. She is in the business of selling a variety of goods, such as cosmetics, sugar, and so on. Soline has been in this business for 5 months.  The hours of her business are from 7am until 9pm every day, except on Sunday.  She currently employs one person to help her. 

She has requested a Kiva loan, via Vision Finance Company, in order to expand her business.  Soline will start adding more cosmetics, more sugar, etc,. to her business.    With the sale of these items, Soline will expand her business and thus increase her profits. With these profits, she will gradually keep reinvesting for better financial stability and savings in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more goods, such as lotions, powders, etc.

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Salma is married, with four boys, all of whom attend school. They live at a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food, electricity bills and school fees. For the past three years, she has operated a fish selling business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. 

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase a freezer for storing fish for sale. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Salma decided to work with Yehu to access loans to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer for storing fish for sale.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Felicitas; ella tiene 50 años de edad y es separada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de choclos y también vende productos secos como quinua, trigo y moraya, ella vende en el mercado de Urcos desde 7:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de venta de choclos y granos secos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar choclos y productos secos al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "The Friends". It is located in the district of Urcos, belonging to the province of Quispicanchis and the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Felicitas. She is 50 years old, separated, and she has 6 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business buying and selling corn and she also sells dry products, such as quinoa, wheat, and dried potatoes. She makes her sales in the market in Urcos from 7am until 5pm. She wants to improve her corn and dried grain business. She requests a loan to purchase corn and dried products in wholesale.

She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase corn and dried products in wholesale

loans.name: Balvina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Balvina; ella tiene 48 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de animales como chancho y cuyes, la socia también vende comida y pan en el distrito de Urcos, la socia realiza diferentes tipos de negocios y saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar los negocios. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar alimentos para los animales y comprar productos para vender comida.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "The Friends". It is located in the district of Urcos, belonging to the province of Quispicanchis and the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Balvina. She is 48 years old, married common-law, and she has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities with her livestock sales business, including pigs and guinea pigs. She also sells prepared foods and bread in the district of Urcos. She carries out different types of businesses in order to support her children. She wants to expand and improve her businesses. She requests a loan to purchase livestock feed and to purchase ingredients she needs to sell her foods. 

She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed and ingredients to prepare foods

loans.name: Lynet

texts.en: Linet is married and has three children, two of whom are still in school. She lives in a rented house where she has electricity but not piped-in water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food, clothing and rent. For the last three years, she has made a living by selling food to neighbors and passersby. In the past, she earned a living by selling clothing. Her biggest challenge is competition, and her main hope is to someday open a restaurant. She decided to join Yehu as a way to access loans that will allow her to improve her family's living standard. She plans to use this loan to buy more items to sell to her customers, including beans, cooking oil and wheat and maize flour.

loans.use: To buy beans, cooking oil and flour to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Chantal

texts.en: Chantal is 31 years old, married and has three children who range in age from 3 to 9 years old. She is well known in her community for selling cosmetics. She opened her business two years ago and works from  6 a.m. until 8 p.m. every day except Sunday. She  has one employee and is applying for this loan from Kiva and Vision Finance Company to buy more cosmetics to sell to her customers. She plans to use the additional income made possible by this loan to expand her business and provide her children with a better life and a good education.

loans.use: To buy more cosmetics to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Hawah

texts.en:
Hawah B. is 40 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is single and has three sons aged 24, 14 and 8; all three are attending school. 

Since 1993 she has been selling soft drinks, water, chicken balls, and eggs around the market. She started with coal and then started trying other products. Her favorite part of the year is the dry season (from late October through May) because it's the time when she makes more money that allows her to send her children to school. 

Hawah is requesting a loan to buy two cartons of eggs, four crates of soft drinks and other products to sell. She wants to grow and improve her business and become an international businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy eggs and soft drinks

loans.name: Peris

texts.en: Peris is divorced and has three children, all of whom attend school. She and her family live in a rented house that has electricity but no piped-in water.  Her greatest monthly expenses are rent, clothing and food. For the last three years, she has made a living by selling vegetables to her neighbors and passerby. Her main challenges are the high cost of transportation and the seasonal nature of her business. In the future, she dreams of owning a farm. Peris is applying for this loan to improve her stall and buy more vegetables to sell to her customers. She decided to join Yehu after seeing how our program benefits its members.

loans.use: To upgrade her stall and buy more vegetables to sell to her customers. matoes.

loans.name: Sophie

texts.en:
Sophie is 24 years old and is married with one child. She is widely known for her business selling a variety of goods such as soap, biscuits, lotions, water and so on. Sophie has been in this business for five years and the hours of her business are from 6am until 9pm every day. 

She has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her business. With this loan, Sophie will start adding to her business the sale of powders, pens, sugar,  etc. With the sale of these items, she will expand her business and thus her profits will increase. With these profits, she will gradually keep reinvesting for better financial stability.

loans.use: To purchase more goods such as lotions, soap, biscuits, and powders, pens, sugar,  etc.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana; ella tiene 53 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 9 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de bar y también vende comida en la plaza de armas de Urcos desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 1:00 p.m y en las tardes se dedica al negocio de bar vendiendo bebidas y gaseosas venta de animales como chancho y cuyes, la socia también vende comida y pan en el distrito de Urcos, la socia realiza diferentes tipos de negocios y saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar los negocios. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar alimentos para los animales y comprar productos para vender comida.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juana, 53, is a member of the “LAS AMISTOSAS” (The Friendly Ones) communal bank located in Urcos District which belongs to Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.

She is a widow with nine children.  She alternates her daily chores with running a bar and also sells food at the main square in Urcos from 8am until 1pm.  She spends afternoons tending to the bar selling beverages and soft drinks.  She also sells farm animals like pigs and guinea pigs.  And she also sells food and bread in Urcos district.  She carries out all kinds of jobs to support her children.  She wants to expand and improve her businesses and is asking for a loan to buy feed for her animals and also to buy ingredients for her food sales.  She is happy about the loan and committed to paying her installments.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and ingredients for food preparation.

loans.name: Jemima

texts.en:
K. is a single lady with one child who attends school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees, food, and electricity. For the past four years, she has operated a butcher shop business, selling to her neighbours and passersby.  K. faces a major challenge of competition from other butcher shop operators in her area of operation.


With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase a freezer to store meat for sale. K. dreams of establishing a slaughter house in the future. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve her business.

loans.use: To purchase a freezer to store meat for sale.

loans.name: Celestin

texts.en:
Celestin is 49 years old and is married with five children aged between 8 and 16 years old. Celestin makes a living by selling a variety of clothes such as: men's clothes and women's clothes. His business is well-organized. Celestin has 4 years of experience. He currently employs one person and his business is open from 7am to 6pm every day except on Sunday.

Celestin has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy more various types of clothes to sell. With any profits, Celestin hopes to continue reinvesting in his business and to save for the future.

loans.use: To buy more men's and women's clothes to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Vidal

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Carlos Vidal; el tiene 32 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también se dedica al transporte, el tiene un mototaxi que hace servicio público en el distrito de Urcos y la tienda de abarrotes atiende su esposa, el socio saca adelante a sus hijos por medio de estos pequeños negocios, el socio quiere mejorar los negocios. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes y para el mantenimiento de su mototaxi.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Carlos Vidal, 32, is a member of the “LAS AMISTOSAS” (The Friendly Ones) communal bank located in Urcos District which belongs to Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.

He has a spouse and three children.  He alternates his daily chores with running a grocery store; he also provides transportation.  He has a mototaxi that he uses to provide public transportation services in Urcos district while his wife tends to the grocery store.  He supports his children through these two small businesses.  He wants to improve the businesses and is asking for a loan to buy stock items for the store and to service his mototaxi.  He is happy about the loan and committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to buy stock items for his grocery store and to service his mototaxi.

loans.name: Mariette

texts.es: La señora Mariette es dueña de una pequeña pensión que tiene en la misma casa donde vive y donde atiende a sus clientes con platos de comida;   el crédito lo necesita para adquirir más insumos como ser fideo, arroz, verduras, condimentos, etc., para elaborar  mayor cantidad de platos a la carta. Vive en casa  de sus padres  ubicada en la zona de Villa San Antonio de la ciudad de La Paz; es casada y  tiene cuatro hijos. La cliente se siente muy feliz con los préstamos que le otorgamos ya que le sirvieron para el crecimiento de su negocio.
texts.en:
Mariette owns a small, home-based eatery where she provides meals for her customers.  She needs the loan to buy more ingredients like: noodles, vegetables, condiments, etc. to make a larger quantity of a la carte dishes.

She lives in her parents’ house located in La Paz’s Villa San Antonio area.  She’s married and has four children. 

She feels very happy with the loans we give her because they were useful for her business’ growth.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her food preparation business.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia D. Quispicanchis y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana; ella tiene 27 años D. edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. mates, ella venD. en forma ambulatoria desD. las 9:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m y por medio D. este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere construir su casa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales D. construcción como cemento, arena y yeso para construir su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the 'Las Amistosas' community bank which is located in Urcos district, in Quispicanchis procince, in Cusco department.

Juana is 27 years old, lives with her partner, and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling maté beverages.  She makes her sales as an itinerant street vendor from 9.00am to 9.00pm.  Through her business she manages to get her children ahead in life.  

Juana would like to build her home.  She is requesting a loan to buy construction supplies such as cement, sand and plaster to build her home.  She is happy to be receiving a loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies such as cement, sand and plaster to build her home

loans.name: Antoinette

texts.en:
Antoinette is 39 years old and is married with three children aged between 5 and 10 years old. She is widely known for her business selling a variety of goods such as beans, rice, eggs and so on.  Antoinette has been in this business for five months and the hours of her business are from 6am until 9.30pm every day except on Sunday. 

She has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her business. With this loan, Antoinette will start adding to her business the sale of biscuits, sugar, etc. With the sale of these goods, Antoinette will expand her business and thus her profits will increase. With these profits, she will gradually keep reinvesting for better financial stability.

loans.use: To buy more various goods to sell such as  rice, eggs and so on.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Haydee; ella tiene 31 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de bar, ella vende gaseosas, cervezas y chicha (bebida a base de maíz), la socia trabaja desde las 10:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar la atención de bar. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar gaseosas y cervezas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Haydee, 31, is a member of the “LAS AMISTOSAS” (The Friendly Ones) communal bank that’s located in Urcos District and is part of Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.

She has a spouse and four children.  She alternates her daily chores with running a bar.  She sells soft drinks, beer and chicha (a corn based beverage).  She works from 10am until 10pm.  She supports her children through this business.  She wants to improve service at the bar and is asking for a loan to buy soft drinks and beer at wholesale.  She is happy about the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy beer and soft drinks at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, beans, corn, sugar and noodles.

loans.name: Braulia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Braulia; ella tiene 47 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida y también tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi a la ciudad de Cusco, el negocio de venta de comida lo realiza en forma ambulatoria, ella prepara caldo de gallina,chiriuchu (es un plato típico de la ciudad de cusco que consta a base de cuy,tortilla,maíz,salchicha y gallina) y chicha blanca, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar los negocios de transporte y venta de comida. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar y mantenimiento de su carro.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Braulia is a member of the 'Las Amistosas' community bank which is located in Urcos district, in Quispicanchis province, in Cusco department.

Braulia is 47 years old, widowed, and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling meals.  She also has a car which provides a taxi service in the city of Cusco.  Braulia carries out her meals business as an itinerant street vendor.  She prepares her chicken soup, chiriuchu (a traditional Cusco dish made from guinea pig, tortilla, corn, sausage and chicken), and 'chicha blanca' (a traditional, white corn-based drink).  Through her businesses, Braulia gets her children ahead in life.

Braulia would like to improve her transportation business and her meals business.  She is requesting a loan to buy cooking supplies and to pay to have maintenance work done on her car.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy cooking supplies and to pay for maintenance work on her car

loans.name: Elmer Antonio

texts.es:
Elmer de 36 años de edad, reside en San Miguel, tiene un taller de enderezado y pintura, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 3 años de edad, dependen económicamente de él.
Elmer tiene el negocio ubicado en su casa de habitación, trabaja todos los días sin tener un horario fijo, pero realmente depende de la demanda de trabajos que tenga para así dedicarle el tiempo necesario, su ventaja es que no existe otro taller cerca del lugar.
El solicita un préstamo para comprar pinturas y una pulidora, esta será una gran ayuda para el desempeño de su trabajo, brindado un mejor servicio a los clientes. Para Elmer este financiamiento es el inicio hasta lograr ampliar el taller y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Elmer, 36, lives in San Miguel.  He has an Auto Detailing shop.  He lives with his wife and 3 year old son who depend on him economically.

Elmer’s business is home-based.  He works every day without a fixed schedule.  He works according to the jobs he has pending dedicating whatever time is necessary to them.  His advantage is that there are no other shops near the place.

He is asking for a loan to buy paint and a polisher.  This will be of great help to his work; he will be able to provide better service to his customers.  For Elmer, this loan is the beginning of an expansion of his workshop in order to improve his family’s quality of life

loans.use: to buy paint and a polisher.

loans.name: Rosaura

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosaura; ella tiene 21 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de bar, ella vende gaseosas y cervezas, la socia trabaja desde las 10:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m y junto con su hermana y mama trabajan juntas, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de bar. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar gaseosas y cervezas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosaura, 21, is a member of the “LAS AMISTOSAS” (The Friendly Ones) communal bank which is located in Urcos District belonging to Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.

She is single and alternates her daily chores with running a bar; she sells soft drinks and beer from 10am until 10pm.  She works alongside her sister and mother.  She wants to improve the bar business and is asking for a loan to buy soft drinks and beer.  She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and beer.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LAS AMISTOSAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Veronica; ella tiene 19 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de jugos en la plaza de armas del distrito de Urcos y también estudia en la universidad en el área de ciencias de salud, la socia quiere prepararse para seguir aprendiendo en la universidad. La socia solicita el préstamo para pagar las mensualidades de la universidad y tambien para pagar los estudios de su hermana.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Verónica, 19, is a member of the “LAS AMISTOSAS” (The Friendly Ones) communal bank that’s located in Urcos District which belongs to Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.

She is single and alternates her daily chores with the sale of juices in the main town square in Urcos.  She’s also going to the university majoring in Health Sciences.  She wants to prepare herself to continue learning at the university.  She is asking for the loan to pay for university fees and to pay for her sister's studies as well. She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to pay for university fees and her sister's tuition

loans.name: Yessica Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yessica, tiene 22 años de edad, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazán, es soltera, vive con su madre, hermanas y una sobrina, se dedica a la venta de empanadas son elaboradas de plátano relleno de leche.
Tiene cuatro años de dedicarse a este negocio, trabaja por medio de su madre quien tiene una experiencia de 20 años en la elaboración de empanadas, trabaja a tiempo completo todos los días de la semana. Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de plátanos, leche, azúcar y gas, estos son su materia prima, la cual necesita diariamente para preparar su venta, contando con ellos podrá dar continuidad al negocio.
Su objetivo es que a través del negocio y sus ganancias pueda tener casa propia y casarse formando su propia familia.
texts.en: Yessica is 22 years old, lives in San Francisco Gotero, in the Morazán department, is single, and lives with her mother, sisters, and one niece. She makes and sells banana empanadas (pie) filled with milk. She has been working in this business for 4 years.  She works with her mother who has had experience in making empanadas for 20 years. She works full time every day of the week. At the moment she is requesting a loan to buy bananas, milk, sugar, and gas which are materials she needs on a daily basis to prepare her sales. Having these materials will allow her to grow her business. Her goal is to save up her money to buy a home and start a family of her own.

loans.use: to buy bananas, milk, sugar, and gas

loans.name: Liliane

texts.en:
Liliane is 36 years old and is married with five children aged between one and a half and 12 years old.  She takes care of two relatives who are 3 and 6 years old.  Liliane owns and operates a small business selling various styles of children`s and women`s clothes. Her business is well organized. and she has been running her business for one year. 

She has now requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company to expand her business by purchasing an additional various clothes to sell such as: more children`s clothes and women`s clothes. This loan will allow her to attract more customers, which will help her to earn more profit and save for the future.

loans.use: To purchase more children's and women`s clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabrics and sewing materials

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna M. is 49 years old and lives in the town of West Point.  She is married and has eight children: three boys and five girls.  Three of her children are currently in school, two are doing business, and three are employed.

For 24 years Anna has been selling provisions in the local market, where she enjoys the location of her business since its situated in a very good position not far from the road. She has many customers and the need for her products is very high, although sometimes business is slow, but almost all of the time she makes good money.

Anna is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, flour, etc. which will enable her to earn more money since the demand from her customers is very high. In the future her plan is to expand her business not only in the local market but internationally.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, flour, etc.

loans.name: Amancaes Group

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “AMANCAES”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac, provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

El Sr. Roberto tiene 53 años de edad, él es casado y tiene 1 hijo; El socio es docente de profesión y actualmente es profesor en la academia Porvenir, el enseña cursos de turismo e idiomas, el socio tiene un hospedaje Turístico en la calle procuradores a una cuadra de la plaza de armas principal de la ciudad del Cusco. El socio disfruta mucho de las reuniones del grupo; el socio requiere el préstamo para invertir en el arreglo y mejorar la decoración de su hospedaje. El socio solicita el préstamo para reinvertir en su hospedaje y poder mejorar la decoración.
 
Los otros socios del banco comunal se dedican a la docencia en la academia Porvenir, dictando las diferentes materias, también hay una secretaria de la misma academia, un contador, y a odontología.
 
El socio valora y agradece el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
This member belongs to communal bank "AMANCAES". This bank is located in the Huanchac district, Cusco province, and Cusco department.

Mr. Roberto is 53 years old, married, and has 1 child. He is a professor and teaches in the Porvenir Academy. He teaches tourism and foreign language courses. He has a lodge for tourists on Attorney Street located a block away from the plaza of arms in the city of Cusco. He really enjoys the group meetings. He is requesting the loan to repair and decorate his lodge.

The other members also teach different courses in the Porvenir Academy. There is also a secretary, accountant, and dentist from the same academy,

The member values and is grateful for the loan offered and commits to pay back the installments in time.

loans.use: to repair and decorate his lodge.

loans.name: Jose Cruz

texts.es:
Don José, reside en Joateca departamento de Morazán, tiene 51 años de edad, se dedica a la producción de maíz, él está casado vive en compañía de su esposa, don José tiene 30 años de ser agricultor, trabajando la tierra en las siembras de maíz y frijol, el periodo que aprovecha para trabajar es el invierno, dejando el verano para la comercialización de la cosecha.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes y semilla mejorada, esta compra con el objetivo de iniciar el proceso de la siembra para este nuevo año, permitiéndole realizar el trabajo y mejorar la cosecha.
Sus proyecciones son mejorar la infraestructura de la vivienda, para tener a su familia más segura y cómoda.
texts.en:
José lives in Joateca, Morazán Department.  He’s 51 years old and is a corn farmer.  He’s married living with his wife.  He’s been a farmer for 30 years.  He works the soil planting corn and beans.  The season he takes advantage of to work is winter leaving summer to sell his harvest.

He is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and improved seed.  This purchase’s goal is to start the planting process for this new year making it possible for him to do the work and improve the crop yields.  His project is to improve the infrastructure of his house so that his family will be more secure and comfortable.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and improved seed.

loans.name: Esmeralda Yaneth

texts.es:
Esmeralda, es una joven de 19 años de edad, reside en Delicias de Concepción departamento de Morazán, está soltera y vive con su madre y hermana. Ella se dedica a vender tortillas, aprendió por su madre desde muy pequeña, pero tiene su propio negocio hace 2 años.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, que es su materia prima en la ejecución de su venta, esta compra será una gran ayuda, pues el maíz es el principal para que ella pueda preparar las tortillas y disponerse a vender.
Su aspiración es estabilizar sus ingresos, para algún día casarse y formar su propio hogar con casa propia.
texts.en:
Esmeralda, 19, lives in Delicias de Concepción, Morazán Department.  She’s single living with her mother and her sister.  She sells tortillas.  She learned from her mother when she was very little but she’s had her own business for the last two years.

She is asking for a loan to buy corn since it’s the raw material for her sales.  This purchase will be of great help to her because corn is the main thing she needs to make the tortillas she intends to sell.  Her hope is to stabilize her income so that she can marry someday and form her own home in a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Jenneh

texts.en:
Jenneh K. is 49 years old and lives in the West Point area. She was not able to attend school. She has two boys, 25 and 30, who are already working and live by themselves. 

Although she did not attend school, Jenneh is an experienced business woman, having sold rice for the past thirty-one years. Her dream all started with just a bag of rice and today she has and manages her own rice store.

Jenneh has requested a loan to purchase more rice as her customers increase on a daily basis.

Jenneh hopes to be an importer of rice in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more rice

loans.name: Tawah

texts.en:
Tawah F. is 34 years old, a mother of five children, and lives in the town of West Point. Her three boys and two girls’ ages range from 4-18 years. She’s engaged in selling palm oil: she buys it in the rural area and sells it in the local market in her community.

Tawah has requested a loan to purchase more palm oil, and hopes to make more profit to enable her to give her children a quality education.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Girmanie

texts.en:
Girmanie P. is thirty-three years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is single and has five children: two girls and three boys. Although she is a high school dropout who only completed grade five, she runs her own snacks business in her community. She sells potato chips and plantain chips amongst others.

Girmanie has requested a loan to purchase more flour and oil, so that she can produce more chips on a daily basis. She hopes her local business can one day be an international one and she hopes to have her own house.

loans.use: to purchase more flour and oil

loans.name: Duo La Alameda Group

texts.es:
DUO.  LA ALAMEDA

MARLENA T. V.. , TIENE 34 AÑOS  DE EDAD,TIENE DOS HIJAS PEQUEÑAS, , ELLA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE ROPA TIPICA, PERO ELLA VENDE SU PRODUCTO AMBULANTE NO TIENE NINGUN PUESTO EN EL MERCADO NI EN SU CASA, ELLA DICE QUE NECESITA SU CREDITO, PARA PODER SURTIR SU NEGOCIO Y COMPRAR ROPA TIPÍCA POR MAYOR. VIDALIA USEN,  ELLA  TIENE 59 AÑOS DE EDAD ELLA TIENE VARIOS HIJOS, PERO LA MAYORIA SON CASADOS ELLA YA SOLO MANTIENE A TRES DE ELLOS, ELLA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE PRODUCTOS DE CONSUMO DIARIO, Y SU CREDITO LO NECESITA PARA PODER COMPRAR MAS PRODUCTO COMESTIBLE DE CONSUMO DIARIO  Y PODER SURTIR SU NEGOCIO.
texts.en:
La Alameda Duo

Marlena T. V., 34, has two little girls.  She sells typical clothing in an itinerant manner; she does not have a fixed sales stand either in the market or at home.  She says she needs financing to stock her business and buy typical clothes at wholesale.

Vidalia Usen, 59, has several children but most of them are married.  She still supports just three of them.  She sells daily consumption items.  She needs the loan to buy more foodstuffs to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy typical clothing at wholesale and to buy daily consumption foodstuffs.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es: Daniela, de 38 años, es una luchadora mujer que día a día labora para sacar adelante a su familia. Ella, es madre soltera, tiene 5 hijos pero solo vive con 4 de ellos, en su casa propia, ubicada a la afueras de la ciudad de San Ramón (selva central peruana). Ella, evita hablar de la situación difícil que vivió con el padre de sus hijos. Pero rescata que aprendió a valorarse como mujer, y siendo muy emprendedora, comenzó a dedicarse en la venta de cerveza y bebidas gasificadas, con el propósito de sacar adelante a sus hijos; además prepara comida para expenderla en su recreo turístico “La Inolvidable”, que recién instaló. Por otro lado cría decenas de patos y gallinas que luego son vendidos así como también lo utiliza para la preparación de sus potajes. Daniela cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos, por eso el negocio le resulta rentable pues no tiene que pagar a terceras personas para que le ayuden en la cocina. Su espíritu emprendedor le lleva a instalar una granja para que pueda vender animales menores al por mayor, puesto que un tiempo anterior percibió buena cantidad de capital al vender decenas de cuyes; orgullosa cuenta además  “críe 120 gallinas, las hice crecer desde muy tiernas y las comercialicé cada una a 35 soles, por eso estoy segura que este negocio me resultará muy beneficioso”. Concluye.  Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Las brisas”, y este es el octavo crédito con MFP y como ya conoce la metodología de trabajo de su banco comunal, le gusta trabajar de manera organizada y siempre velando por el bienestar de los socios. Daniela, compra constantemente mercadería para su negocio, por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará los insumos necesarios para que prepare comida, además de cerveza, bebidas gasificadas y algunos dulces.
texts.en:
Daniela, 38, is a fighter; she struggles every day to so that her family can get ahead.  She is a single mother of five children but only four of them still live with her in her own house located in the outskirts of the city of San Rafael (Peruvian central jungle).  

She tries to avoid talking about the difficult situation she lived with the father of her children.  But she does state that what she managed to rescue from the experience is to value herself as a woman and, being very enterprising, she started to sell beer and carbonated soft drinks with the goal of supporting her children.  She also prepares food to sell at her tourist stop ‘La Inolvidable” (The Unforgettable One) that she recently opened.  On the other hand, she raises ducks and chickens that are later sold or used in the preparation of her stews.  Daniela’s children help her and this is why the business is profitable: she does not have to pay salaries to kitchen help.  

Her enterprising spirit led her to set up a farm in order to sell small farm animals at wholesale because sometime ago she made a good amount of money selling guinea pigs by the dozen.  Proudly she adds:  “I raised 120 chickens.  I cared for them since they were very young and sold them for 35 soles a piece.  This is why I’m so sure that this business will have very beneficial results.” She concludes.

She is a member of the “Las Brisas” (The Breezes) communal bank and this is the 8th loan with MFP.  Because she’s already familiar with the communal bank’s work methodology she likes to work in an organized way always caring for the wellbeing of the members.

Daniela is constantly buying merchandise for her business so will be using the requested loan to buy the ingredients necessary to prepare her food as well as beer, carbonated soft drinks and some sweets.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her stews as well as to buy beer and carbonated soft drinks.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel, es una señora de 43 años de edad, dedicada a la venta de tortillas, comida y enchiladas, vive junto a sus cuatro hijos y residen en San Carlos Departamento de Morazán, Ella tiene un chalet, por el que paga alquiler a la alcaldía municipal, este lugar es su puesto de venta, atiende de lunes a sábado.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, leña y bebidas, con esta inversión busca mejorar su atención a los clientes y reforzar el negocio, abasteciéndolo de los materiales más necesarios para la producción.
El objetivo de ella es ayudar a su familia, que puedan sus hijos finalizar sus estudios, también otra de sus metas es mejorar la infraestructura de la casa donde vive con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maribel is 43 years old, single, and she sells tortillas, food, and enchiladas.  She lives in the San Carlos Department of Morazán along with her four children.  She has a chalet which she rents from the city.  This is her point of sale and she works there from Monday to Saturday.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy dried corn, firewood, and drinks.  She hopes to improve her customer service through this investment, as well as strengthen and stock the business with the items she needs most for production.

Her goal is to help her family, and be able to pay for her children's education.  Another goal is to improve the home where she and her children live.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca, de 53 años, es una madre de familia que ama los cultivos, ella está casada con Luis de 64 años, ambos tienen un hijo Jarol de 33 años, con quien vive en su casa propia ubicada a las afueras de la ciudad de San Ramón (selva central peruana). Mientras que su esposo labora como mecánico de aviación, ella, desde hace 16 años cuida con mucho amor sus cultivos de frutas cítricas, café y plátanos, con la contratación de operarios, quienes dejan limpios sus plantaciones.  A Francisca, le gusta cosechar sus productos porque en ellos observa que valió la pena los esfuerzos realizados, además como algunos terrenos están cerca cosecha principalmente sus naranjas para consumo, por otro lado, cuenta que le resulta difícil encajonarlos para comercializarlos a los acopiadores de su ciudad o a los mayoristas del mercado, porque le conviene venderlos en las mismas chacras, asegura que gracias a la agricultura tiene su casa propia, terrenos y puede vivir sin preocupaciones, pero también , es conciente de que más adelante se limitará a arrendar sus tierras, por eso como cuenta con un espacio en su domicilio, piensa instalar una bodega muy bien surtida de productos comestibles. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Las brisas”, y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, y como presidente de la junta directiva de su grupo, hace respetar los acuerdos tomados en las reuniones, de igual manera las normas de su reglamento interno, y como todos los socios son responsables, le agrada laborar con ellos. Francisca, muy pronto comenzará la cosecha de café, por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico, que esparcirá sobre sus cultivos para nivelar la producción, y así pueda obtener una buena cosecha.
texts.en:
Francisca is 53 years old and a mother who loves to farm.  She is married to 64 year old, Luis and they have one son, 33 year old Jarol, who lives in his own home in San Ramón (central jungle of Peru).  Meanwhile, while her husband does his job as an aviation mechanic, she cares for her crops, as she has been doing for 16 years.  These include citrus fruits, coffee, and bananas and she works with the help of paid farmhands.  She likes to harvest because it’s there where she can see the value of her efforts.  Some of the farmland is close by and she primarily harvests her oranges to eat.  It doesn’t pay for her to harvest them, package them up sell them to the distributers in the market, it’s better for her to sell them right from the orchard.

She tells us that she has her own home and land because of her farming.  She is able to live without any concerns, but she knows that she will eventually not be able to care for her land anymore, so she has set aside some space in her home to set up a little grocery store.  She is a member of the “Las Brisas” communal bank and this will be her eighth loan through MFP.  As the group’s president, she ensures that the members meet their commitments.  Like the others, she is very responsible and she likes working with everyone.  Francisca will soon begin harvesting the coffee and she will use the money from this loan to buy sacks of organic fertilizer that she will spread to even out her production and be able to have a good harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Gloria, de 46 años de edad, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazán, se dedica a la venta de refrescos, vive junto a sus hijos, y actualmente necesita comprar materia prima para hacer los refrescos, su especialidad es el refresco de Horchata, y su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado del centro de la ciudad.

Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales por ejemplo, azúcar, maní, ajonjolí, bolsas, esta compra le ayudara a mantener lo suficiente en su inventario, del cual puede disponer para preparar sus ventas, en el momento deseado.

Su objetivo es que a través del negocio pueda recibir las ganancias necesarias para cubrir la el pago de agua potable en su vivienda y ayudar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gloria is 46 years old and lives in San Francisco Gotera in the Morazán Department.  She sells soft drinks, and lives with her children.  She needs to buy supplies and ingredients with which to make her soft drinks.  Her specialty is hibiscus soft drink.  Her business is located in the city's central market.

She is asking for this loan to buy sugar, mani, sesame seed, and bags.  This will help her to keep her inventory up, so that she can be ready to make sales at every opportunity.

Her goal is to earn enough money through her business to be able to afford potable water and help her children.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies

loans.name: Julio Alberto

texts.es:
Don Julio, es un señor de 53 años de edad, reside en Chilanga departamento de Morazán, vive en compañía de su esposa, se dedica a la venta de CD Y DVD de forma ambulante, ofreciendo sus productos a los vecinos del lugar y a otros municipios. Este  negocio lo tiene desde hace 7 años, surgió la idea por la necesidad y el desempleo, para llevar el sustento a su familia.

Actualmente esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería, este inversión será importante para fortalecer el negocio y ofrecer a los clientes variedad de música y películas, obteniendo más oportunidad de venta.

Su objetivo es crecer en el negocio, que a través de él pueda adquirir un lote para hacer su propia casa.
texts.en:
Julio is 53 years old and lives with his wife in Chilanga, within the Morazán department.  He sells CDs and DVDs on foot, offering his products to his neighbors and others.  He’s been in this business for seven years, after he got the idea out of necessity to support his family while he was unemployed.

He is asking for this loan in order to buy merchandise.  This will be an important investment that will help strengthen his business by allowing him to offer his customers a greater variety of music and movies, improving his chances of making sales.

He wants to grow with his business and eventually be able to buy a lot where he can build a house.

loans.use: to buy CDs and DVDs for resale

loans.name: Solidario Las Trabajadoras De Sumpango Group

texts.es:
Las Trabajadoras D. Sumpango

María Luisa, Nancy,Y Elsa integran el grupo D. las trabajadoras Sumpangueras,ellas reciden en  Un pueblo que se encuentra muy cerca D. la ciudad Capital. Doña Luisa se dedica a la venta D. comida en una fabrica textilera que se encuentra aproximadamente a 10 km del pueblo, al igual que Nancy Y Elsa (hija y nuera) pues ellas tienen el mismo oficio, ellas preparan alrededor D. 200 almuerzos diarios algo que no es suficiente ya que tienen mas demanda D. almuerzos pero el capital no les alcanza es por eso que solicitan un crédito a Fape para tener mas capital  Para comprar productos comestibles para elavorar comida y así preparar mas almuerzos ellas han trabajado por mucho tiempo con Fape y han sido muy puntuales en cuanto a los pagos, es por eso que ellas estarían muy agradecidas si les otorgara un crédito ya que así podrían ampliar sus negocios y tener una mejor calidad D. vida
texts.en:
The Working Women of Sumpango

María Luisa, Nancy, and Elsa form the group called, The Working Women of Sumpango.  They live in a village very near the capital city.  Luisa sells food in a textile factory located about 10 km from the village.  Nancy and Elsa (daughter and daughter in law) work in the same business.  They prepare about 200 lunches daily, but this does not meet the demand.  They don’t have the necessary working capital to expand, so they are requesting this loan through Fape to be able to buy ingredients to increase production.  They have been working with Fape for a long time and have always been on time with their payments.  They would be very grateful for this loan and it would help them improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. María; la socia tiene 47 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de verdura para luego venderlo en la ciudad de Puerto Maldonado la socia viaja cada fin de semana dependiendo de los pedidos que le solicitan, a la vez la socia viaja a la ciudad de Tacna para comprar algunos artefactos como licuadoras,planchas,televisores para venderlo a sus amistades, familiares y vecinos, la socia es una persona bien alegre y responsable.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mas mercadería para sus negocios.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
María is 47 years old and has three children.  She buys vegetables to resell in Puerto Maldonado.  She travels there each weekend, depending on her orders, and also stops in Tacna to buy some other items such as blenders, irons, and televisions to resell to her family, friends, and neighbors.  She is a very pleasant and responsible person.

She is asking for this loan on order to buy more merchandise for her neighbors.  She is happy about this loan and is committed making her payments in time.

loans.use: to buy small appliances for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clay, firewood and nacazcol (seeds that provide a black dye).

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Gabriel; él tiene 52 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias brindando el servicio de taxi, el socio cuenta con su carrito y sale a trabajar todos los días de lunes a domingo por el día, aunque este horario puede variar dependiendo de las actividades que tenga que realizar en el dia, el socio mediante este trabajo saca a su familia adelante especialmente a  sus hijos.

El socio solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro en la compra de llantas.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. Gabriel is a member of the Communal Bank “Los Lideres” (The Leaders) which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 52 years old, married, and has two children. Gabriel divides his time between his daily activities and providing taxi services. He has his own car and leaves for work every day Monday through Sunday. His schedule varies depending on the activities he has to accomplish during the day. Through his job, Gabriel is able to move his family forward, especially his children.

The loan he is requesting will be used to maintain his vehicle and purchase tires. Gabriel is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: To purchase tires and pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase sorbets of different flavors, popsicles, and cups.

loans.name: Virgen Maria De Inquilpata Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN MARIA DE INQUILPATA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sinforosa; ella es casada y tiene 57 años y 7 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de queso y también vende productos secos, ella vende en el mercado de Huancaro desde las 7:00 a.m hasta 6:00 p.m y en algunas oportunidades la socia vende verduras como habas, arvejas y zanahorias, la socia quiere mejorar el negocio de venta de queso y venta de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar queso y verduras.


Los otros socios  se dedican la venta de bebidas, venta de chanchos, venta de bebidas, venta de animales y venta de materiales de construcción. 


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the Communal Bank “Virgen Maria de Inquilpata” which is located in the District and Province of Anta, Department of Cusco.

One member is Sra. Sinforosa. She is 57 years old, married, and has seven children. Sinforosa earns her living by selling cheese and dried products. She sells at the market in Huancaro from 7am to 6pm. On a few occasions, she sells vegetables such as beans, peas, and carrots. Sinforosa wants to improve her business, so she is requesting a loan to buy cheese and vegetables.

The other members are engaged in retail businesses selling beverages, pigs, soft drinks, animals, and construction materials. They are grateful to those who have helped them fulfill their dreams, so they promise to complete their payments on time.

loans.use: To purchase cheese and vegetables.

loans.name: Luis Gadwin

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Luis Gadwin; él tiene 30 años de edad y es soltero; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando como maestro constructor el trabaja en las diferentes obras que se realizan y solicitan sus servicios, el socio trabaja de forma independiente y ahora más que nunca trabaja casi todo el día ya que su pareja tiene 8 meses de embarazo y el necesita juntar dinero para los gastos que se le presentaran más adelante, él es una persona bien alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de seguir trabajando ahora por su familia.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de algunos instrumentos de obra que le hacen falta y para seguir juntando dinero para su familia.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. Luis Gadwin is a member of the Communal Bank “Los Lideres” (The Leaders) which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

He is 30 years old and single. Luis divides his time between his daily activities and his job as a master builder. He works on different projects from those who request his services. Luis works independently and now is busy almost every day since his partner is eight months pregnant. Therefore, he needs to accumulate funds for the expenses that he expects to incur in the future. He is a cheerful and responsible person who desires to continue working for his family.

The loan he is requesting will be used to purchase instruments for his work that he is lacking as well as continue saving money for his family. Luis is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: To purchase instruments for his work.

loans.name: Rita

texts.es: Rita, tiene 36 años, está felizmente casada con Edwin de 48 años, ambos tienen 5 hijos y viven en una casa alquilada, muy cómoda y bien situada a las afueras de la ciudad de San Ramón (selva central peruana), para la actividad que desempeña y que no le permitirían realizar en el centro de la ciudad. Buscando el bienestar de sus hijos Rita, junto a su esposo se dedican a la fabricación de ladrillos en un espacio amplió y cercano por donde viven, también de manera independiente ella, tiene un taller de pirotecnia donde elabora cohetecillos, y diferentes ilustraciones de animales y objetos que al encenderse produce chispas y luces de diferentes colores en las fiestas patronales que se desarrollan en esta parte de la selva central “La Merced”, por otro lado cuando su pareja no le ayuda, practica el oficio de músico que también le resulta rentable y hasta le permite ahorrar. En adelante desea  construir su casa propia en la ciudad y de esa manera instalar un restaurante, que le facilite un negocio menos peligroso, ella, lleva 15 años dedicada a estas labores y asegura que gracias a esta actividad a sus hijos nunca les faltó que comer. Pero el costo de los estudios de sus hijos es su prioridad, por ello invierte la mayor parte de sus ingresos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “La brisas”, y este es el séptimo crédito con MFP y  está feliz de continuar laborando con los integrantes de su banco comunal, quienes son personas muy solidarias, acogedoras y responsables. Rita, con el crédito que solicita, comprará materiales pirotecnicos, cohetes, papel cometa, mechas, y cordeles.
texts.en:
Rita is 36 years old and happily married to Edwin, age 48. They have five children and live in a comfortable rented house that is situated in a good location on the outskirts of the city of San Ramón in the central Peruvian jungle. Due to her business activity, she is not allowed to operate in the central part of the city. In order to provide for the welfare of their children, Rita and her husband manufacture bricks in a spacious area located near their home. In addition, she works independently at her fireworks workshop where she makes miniature rockets and outlines of different animals and objects that are ignited with sparklers and different colored lights. Rita designs these products for the patron saint festivals that are held in the part of the central jungle known as “La Merced”. When her husband is not helping her, Rita also performs as a musician to earn extra income which helps her to accumulate savings. Going forward, she wants to build her own house in the city and establish a restaurant so that she can have a business that is less dangerous. Rita has been working for fifteen years and thanks to her business activities, her children have never gone hungry. However, her children’s education is a priority so she will use a large portion of her earnings to pay for these expenses.

Rita is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Brisas” (The Breezes) and this is her seventh loan with MFP. She is happy to continue working with the other members of her Communal Bank since they are supportive, friendly, and responsible people. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy materials for making fireworks and rockets such as kite paper, staples, and string.

loans.use: To purchase materials for making fireworks and rockets such as kite paper, staples, and string.

loans.name: Maria Elsa

texts.es:
Doña María, tiene 49 años de edad, reside en Cacaopera, departamento de Morazán, se dedica a la venta de papitas, dulces y CD, vive en compañía de su hija Reyna, quien le colabora en las ventas y su hijo Eduardo, que estudia.
Ella tiene 30 años de experiencia, el negocio lo heredo de sus padres, su horario de venta es de 8:00am a 6:00pm, lo atiende en su vivienda y en ocasiones de feria sale a vender, actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materia prima y mercadería.
Este préstamo le ayudara a crecer adquiriendo lo necesario para la preparación de su venta como papas, dulces, así mismo CD variados, satisfaciendo las exigencias de los clientes. Su objetivo con el negocio es, estabilizar sus ventas en la zona y darse a conocer con los clientes.
texts.en:
Doña María is 49 years old and resides in Cacaopera, Department of Morazán. She sells potato chips, candy, and CDs. Maria lives with her daughter Reyna, who helps her with making sales, and her son Eduardo who is a student.
