She has thirty years of experience. Maria inherited this business from her parents. Her hours of operation are from 8am to 6pm. She manages her business from her home and occasionally sells at the fair. At the moment, she is requesting a loan to buy materials and merchandise.

This business will help her grow by being able to acquire items to sell such as potatoes, candy, and various CDs so that she can meet the demands of her customers. Her goals for her business are to stabilize her sales in the area and to get to know her customers.

loans.use: To purchase potatoes, candy, and CDs.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es: Esther, es una abnegada madre de familia, que vive junto a sus hijos y su esposo en las afueras de la ciudad de San Ramón (selva central peruana). Desde las primeras horas del día comienza a vender los ricos pasteles que prepara un día antes. Según menciona vende un promedio de 4 pasteles en total, obteniendo ganancias considerables. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es amasar la harina,  “pues ahí está el secreto de un buen pastel”, afirma. Como en la zona donde vive no existe muchos comercios ni pastelerías, le es rentable la venta de los pasteles que prepara, pero es consiente que la falta de capital de trabajo la limita. Por ello está trabajando con ahínco  para poder ahorrar lo necesario y así comprar un horno artesanal con el que podrá elaborar además de tortas, panecillos y demás bocaditos a base de harina. “Todo esto lo realizó para poder darle una buena educación a mis hijos”, menciona. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “La brisas”, y este es el séptimo crédito que tiene con MFP, donde se siente agradecida por el apoyo que recibe constantemente. Esther, en está campaña de cosecha de café, vende más tortas por lo que comprará con el crédito solicitado, insumos como harina, huevos y mantequilla, en grandes cantidades para la elaboración de más tortas.
texts.en:
Esther is a selfless mother. She lives with her children and husband on the outskirts of the city of San Ramón in the central Peruvian jungle. From the early hours of the morning, she begins selling her rich cakes that she prepared the day before. Esther says that she sells an average of four cakes, which generate considerable earnings. What she enjoys most about her work is mixing the batter. “This is the secret to making a good cake,” Esther claims. There are hardly any shops or bakeries in her area, so selling the cakes she prepares is quite profitable. However, the lack of capital limits her work. For this reason, she is working hard to save enough money to buy an artisan oven for making cakes, buns, and other baked goods. Esther says, “I do all I can to provide my children with a good education.”

She is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Brisas” (The Breezes) and this is her seventh loan with MFP. Esther is grateful for the support she constantly receives. During the coffee harvesting season, she sells more cakes. For this reason, the loan she is requesting will be used to buy supplies such as flour, eggs, and butter in large quantities for making cakes.

loans.use: To purchase flour, eggs, and butter for making cakes.

loans.name: Jose Humberto

texts.es:
José de 27 años de edad, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, vive con su familia y su hijo de 2 años y medio, él se dedica a la crianza de ganado y cerdo, lo realiza hace 3 años y lo aprendió de sus padres, comercializa los cerdos y el ganado los miércoles y domingo, que son los días de comercio de Corinto.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de concentrado para los cerdos y alimento para el ganado, este préstamo le ayudara a cubrir el gasto y tendrá como alimentar a sus animales durante un tiempo.
Su objetivo es ampliarse con el número de ganado y cerdos, ya que de él dependen sus ingresos y el sostenimiento de su familia.
texts.en:
José is 27 years old and resides in Corinto in the Department of Morazán. He lives with his family, which includes his 2½ year old son. José has been raising cattle and pigs for three years and learned this trade from his parents. He sells the animals on Wednesdays and Sundays since these are the designated trade days in Corinto.

At the moment, he is requesting a loan to buy feed for his pigs and cattle. This loan will help cover his expenses and provide enough food to feed his animals for a while. His goal is to increase the number of cattle and pigs in his possession. He depends on the income to support his family.

loans.use: To purchase feed for his pigs and cattle.

loans.name: Maritza Maximina

texts.es:
Maritza de 24 años de edad, reside en Lolotiquillo, departamento de Morazán, es madre soltera de dos hijos de 3 y 2 años de edad, con quienes vive, son dependientes, ella se dedica a atender su negocio de productos de consumo y también ofrece ropa de forma ambulante, lleva un año y medio de dedicarse a vender, la necesidad de proveer para sus hijos la llevo a buscar un oficio de donde reciba lo necesario para la alimentación y salud de ellos.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos para el negocio, también ropa nueva para comercializar, contribuyendo así a mejorar el inventario y mantenerse en pie con el negocio.
Su objetivo es ir mejorando poco a poco las condiciones actuales de su familia, dando a sus hijos lo más necesario y trabajando fuerte por tener una vida más confortable.
texts.en:
Maritza is 24 years old and resides in Lolotiquillo in the Department of Morazán. She is a single mother who lives with her two dependent children, ages 3 and 2. Maritza manages a business selling consumer products, but she also sells clothing as a traveling merchant. She has been selling for a year and a half as a way of providing her children what they need, such as food and health care.

Maritza is currently requesting a loan to buy products for her business as well as new clothing to sell. This will help improve her inventory and maintain her business. Her goals are to improve the conditions for her family, provide her children what they need the most, and work hard to achieve a more comfortable life.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her store and new clothing to sell.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es: Sara, de 42 años, es madre soltera, tiene 2 hijos pero sólo vive con la menor en las afueras de la ciudad de San Ramón (selva central peruana), puesto que su hijo mayor, trabaja de manera independiente en otra localidad, en busca de un futuro mejor. Anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de prendas de vestir pero como ya no puede salir a ofrecer su mercadería por atender a su menor hija, ella, los fines de semana prepara diferentes tipos de  comida al gusto de sus comensales, quienes le solicitan platillos de su preferencia. Sara lleva 7 años dedicada a diferentes negocios, que le resultan muy rentables, pero como le encanta preparar potajes de diferentes zonas del Perú, expende su arte culinario, su habilidad no tiene limites, por eso en adelante quiere tener su propio restaurante en un espacio que acondicionará en  su casa.  También hace poco reabrió una tienda de venta de zapatos, zapatillas y prendas de vestir, los cuales vende al por mayor y menor, ya le están brindando ganancias considerables. Ahora menciona que muy pronto recuperará el dinero invertido y podrá ver las ganancias de su nueva tienda. Asimismo está juntando dinero para poder negociar junto a un socio una empresa de trasmisión de cables, con 20 canales diferentes. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Las brisas”  y esta es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde se siente contenta de laborar en su banco comunal, porque le enseñan a ahorrar, además todos sus integrantes son muy responsables y cuidan su historial crediticio. Sara necesita capital de trabajo por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará los insumos necesarios para preparar comida durante los fines de semana.
texts.en:
Sara is 42 years old and a single mother of two children, but only the younger child lives with her on the outskirts of the city of San Ramón in the central Peruvian jungle. Her older child lives in another town and works independently in hopes of finding a better future. Sara previously sold clothing, but she did not succeed in offering her merchandise because she had to take care of her young daughter. On the weekends, she prepares different types of food based on the preferences of her customers who request different things. Sara has been working seven years in different businesses that have been profitable, but now she enjoys preparing dishes from different regions of Peru and expanding her cooking abilities. Her talent is limitless and she hopes in the future to establish her own restaurant in a suitable space in her home. She also would like to reopen her store where she sells shoes, slippers, and clothing in bulk and by the unit because these products generate considerable income. Sara says that she hopes to recoup her investment quickly so that she can use the money for her new store. She is also setting aside money to enter into a joint venture with another member who owns a cable television business that provides 20 different channels.

Sara is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Brisas” (The Breezes) and this is her eighth loan with MFP. She is pleased to be working with her Communal Bank because she has learned how to save. In addition, all of the members are responsible and careful with their credit histories. Sara needs this loan to use as operating capital. She will buy supplies for preparing the dishes she sells on the weekends.

loans.use: To purchase supplies for food preparation.

loans.name: Marie Claire

texts.fr:
Marie Claire est âgée de 52ans, mère de 2grands enfants qui sont âgés de 33 et 34ans.
Elle détient un restaurant  à son domicile  depuis 2ans ou elle fait des plats quotidiens pour attirer ses client.
 Ses ventes journalières sont de 25.000F et 45.000F quand les temps sont bons.
Avec le prêt  actuel, elle achètera 1carton de poissons salés, un panier de poissons fumé, du poisson d’eau douce, 1sac de riz, 1bidon d’huile, 1filet d’oignons, 1sac de charbon.
 
Son soucis majeur est de  persévérer dans l’alimentaire pour accroitre ses revenus afin d’avoir un prêt très important dans les cycles suivants.
Très rigoureuse, elle tient que son deuxième fils aille se spécialiser en médecine dans un pays plus structuré en la matière.
texts.en: Marie Claire is 52 years old and the mother of two grown children, 33 and 34 years old.  For two years, she has been keeping a restaurant at her home, preparing everyday dishes for her clients. Her daily receipts range between 25,000 and 45,000 West African Francs, when things are going well. With this loan, she will purchase a box of salted fish, a basket of smoked fish, some freshwater fish, one bag of rice, one jug of oil, one string of onions, one bag of charcoal. Her main concern is to be able to grow her food business to increase her revenues and be able to take out larger loans in subsequent cycles. Very serious, she insists that her second son  should do his medical training in a country with better infrastructure.

loans.use: to purchase a box of salted fish, a basket of smoked fish, some freshwater fish, one bag of rice, one jug of oil, etc.

loans.name: Sulma Yesenia

texts.es:
Sulma, tiene 29 años de edad, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, vive con sus padres, ella es madre soltera de un niño llamado Kilmar Martir, de 6 años de edad. Ella administra un bazar, donde ofrece ropa, calzado, cosméticos, tiene 2 años de existir, nació por la necesidad de tener una estabilidad de ingresos para su hijo y la asesoraron unas parientes que son comerciantes, su horario de atención es de 7:00am a 4:00pm.
Ella necesita comprar mercadería para abastecer el bazar, por lo que solicita un préstamo para realizar la inversión, de esta manera comprara diversidad de cosméticos, prendas de vestir y calzado.
Su propósito es sacar adelante a su hijo, trabajar fuerte por él, dándole una vida en mejores condiciones en cuando a salud, educación y alimentación.
texts.en:
Sulma is 29 years old and lives in Corinto, in Morazán department, with her parents.  She is a single mother and has one son called Kilmar Martir who is 6 years old.  Sulma has a store where she sells clothes, footwear and cosmetics.  She has owned her business for two years.  It came about because she needed to make a stable income for her son.  She received advice from some family members who are salespeople.  Sulma works from 7.00am to 4.00pm.

Sulma needs to buy merchandise to stock her store.  She is requesting a loan so that she can make this investment.  She will buy a range of cosmetics, clothes and footwear.

Sulma's goal is to give her son her son a good start in life, to work hard for him and to provide him with a better life in terms of health, education and diet.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothes wholesale, to buy traditional clothes wholesale and to buy corn and firewood for making tortillas

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Roberto; él tiene 60 años de edad, casado y tiene 3 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias transportando carga a las distintas provincias de Cusco como Urubamba, Calca,Pisaq y Ollantaytambo el tiene un chofer para este negocio, a la vez el socio cuenta con otro carrito el cual brinda el servicio de taxi el trabaja todos los días por las mañanas y tardes siendo estas sus actividades que realiza para sacar a su familia adelante, el socio desea continuar así y espera poder agrandar mas su negocio.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la mantención de su camión en el cambio de aceite y frenos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Roberto is a member of the "Los Líderes" (The Leaders) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Roberto is 60 years old, married, and has 3 children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business transporting cargo to the different provinces of Cusco such as Urubamba, Calca, Pisaq and Ollantaytambo.  He has a driver for this business.  Roberto also has a small car that he uses to provide a taxi service.  He works every day, morning and afternoon.  These are the businesses which he carries out in order to get his family ahead in life.  He would like to continue in these businesses and hopes to be able to expand them.

Roberto is requesting this loan so that he can have some maintenance work done on his truck.  It needs its oil and brakes changing.  He is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to have maintenance work done on his truck (changing the oil and brakes)

loans.name: Cristopher Marsall

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Christopher; él tiene 26 años de edad, soltero; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de artefactos eléctricos como licuadoras, planchas entre otros y ropa para niños, adultos el viaja hasta la ciudad de Tacna para comprar su mercadería y así poder venderlos a sus amistades  y clientes que le solicitan ,el trabaja de forma independiente, a la vez el socio es estudiante de la carrera de guía de turismo de un instituto privado ya está en media carrera y espera poder seguir adelante para poder trabajar en lo que le gusta.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de mas mercadería para su negocio.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "LOS LIDERES" communal bank which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mr. Christopher is 26 years old, single, and alternates his daily activities with his business of buying and selling electric appliances such as blenders, irons, etc., and other items such as clothing for children and adults.  He travels to the city of Tacna to buy the merchandise he then sells to friends and customers.  He works independently and also studies in a private institute to be a tour guide.  He is halfway through his education and hopes to be able to get ahead so he can work in the area he likes best.

He is requesting a loan to buy merchandise for his business.  He is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for his business

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
Guadalupe, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, tiene 29 años de edad, está casada con William Javier, vive en compañía de sus padres y hermanos, tiene una hija llamada Kenia Guadalupe de 5 años de edad.
Él negocio de Guadalupe es la venta de ropa, con un horario de 6:00am a 1:00pm, vende únicamente los días de comercio. Por el momento su plan es surtir el negocio de ropa, por lo que solicita un préstamo para realizar la inversión, ayudándole esta compra a variar su mercadería de prendas de vestir nuevas.
Su aspiración es ser comerciante por largo plazo, contar con financiamientos para desarrollarse en el mercado, y ofreciendo a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Guadalupe lives in Corinto in the department of Morazán.  She is 29 years old and married to William Javier.  They live with his parents and siblings, and have a daughter named Kenia Guadalupe, who is 5 years old.

Guadalupe sells clothing on work days from 6:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.  Her current plan is to buy more clothing so she can offer a wider variety of new garments.  She needs the loan to help her with this purchase.

Her goal is to be a merchant in a larger location and obtain funding to develop her market so she can offer her family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy more clothing

loans.name: Ciro

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Ciro; él tiene 47 años de edad, casado y tiene 3 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias brindando el servicio de transporte urbano el socio es quien maneja la combi y trabaja de lunes a sábado por las mañanas bueno este horario puede variar de acuerdo a las actividades que pueda realizar durante el día, a la vez el socio desea comprar un carrito para ponerlo al servicio de taxi y de esta manera tener otro ingreso económico para su familia , el socio también  trabaja con su esposa transportando a turistas a sus distintos tours que tengan ya que su esposa es guía de turismo y ambos trabajan cuando tienen servicios en su propio carrito.

El socio solicita el préstamo para aumentar su capital para la compra de su carrito.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank, "LOS LIDERES", which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mr. Ciro is 47 years old, married and has three children.  He alternates his daily activities with his urban transport service.  He drives a minivan and works from Monday to Saturday in the mornings, depending on what activities he has scheduled during the day.  He wants to buy a car to set up a taxi service so he can increase the family's income.  He also works with his wife, who is a tour guide, by transporting tourists on different tours.  They work together using their vehicle to provide service.

The member is requesting a loan to increase capital to buy a car.

He is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To increase capital to buy a car
